359.oscript:
- name: Import URL Mapping (dynurl) - {{ import_url_mapping_id }}
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.url_mapping.import_file
    isamapi:
      id: "{{ import_url_mapping_id }}"
      filename: "{{ import_url_mapping_filename }}"
  when: import_url_mapping_id is defined and import_url_mapping_filename is defined
  notify: Commit Changes

name avi webhook create or update webh.prompt: name avi webhook  create or update webhook

2074.oscript:
- name: Avi Webhook | Create or Update Webhook
  vmware.alb.avi_webhook:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    callback_url: "{{ item.callback_url | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
    verification_token: "{{ item.verification_token | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.webhook | default([]) }}"

    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    callback_url: "{{ item.callback_url | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
    verification_token: "{{ item.verification_token | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:

  community.network.network.avi.avi_alertemailconfig:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    cc_emails: "{{ item.cc_emails | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    to_emails: "{{ item.to_emails | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.alertemailconfig | default([]) }}"

7503.oscript:
- name: Configure Reverse Proxy {{ config_reverseproxy_aac_instance_id }} for AAC
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.aac_configuration.config
    isamapi:
      instance_id: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_instance_id }}"
      hostname: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_hostname }}"
      port: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_port }}"
      username: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_username }}"
      password: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_password }}"
      reuse_certs: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_reuse_certs }}"
      reuse_acls: "{{ config_reverseproxy_aac_reuse_acls }}"
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Reverse Proxy

    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Reverse Proxy

  include_jinja_vars:
    content: "---\n{% set vt = corpusops_vars.vt %}\n{% set is_docker    = corpusops_vars.is_docker\
      \ %}\n{% set is_lxc       = corpusops_vars.is_lxc %}\n{% set is_container =\
      \ corpusops_vars.is_container %}\n{% if ansible_lsb.id == 'Ubuntu' and ((ansible_distribution_major_version|copsf_looseversion)\
      \ >= ('18'|copsf_looseversion)) %}\n{% set bionic_and_later = True %}\n{% else\
      \ %}\n{% set bionic_and_later = False %}\n{% endif %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_autoupgrades\
      \    = corpusops_localsettings_autoupgrades     | default(corpusops_vars.security)\
      \ %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_basepkgs        = corpusops_localsettings_basepkgs\
      \         | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_certbot       \
      \  = corpusops_localsettings_certbot          | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_hostname\
      \        = corpusops_localsettings_hostname         | default(False) %}\n{%\
      \ set corpusops_localsettings_dockercompose   = corpusops_localsettings_dockercompose\
      \    | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_docker          = corpusops_localsettings_docker\
      \           | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_editor     \
      \     = corpusops_localsettings_editor           | default(not is_docker) %}\n\
      {% set corpusops_localsettings_etckeeper       = corpusops_localsettings_etckeeper\
      \        | default(not is_docker) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_git   \
      \          = corpusops_localsettings_git              | default(True) %}\n{%\
      \ set corpusops_localsettings_golang          = corpusops_localsettings_golang\
      \           | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_jdk        \
      \     = corpusops_localsettings_jdk              | default(False) %}\n{% set\
      \ corpusops_localsettings_kubectl         = corpusops_localsettings_kubectl\
      \          | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_locales     \
      \    = corpusops_localsettings_locales          | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_makinastates\
      \    = corpusops_localsettings_makinastates     | default(False) %}\n{% set\
      \ corpusops_localsettings_minikube        = corpusops_localsettings_minikube\
      \         | default(false) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_nodejs       \
      \   = corpusops_localsettings_nodejs           | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_nvm\
      \          = corpusops_localsettings_nvm           | default(False) %}\n{% set\
      \ corpusops_localsettings_nscd            = corpusops_localsettings_nscd   \
      \          | default(not is_docker) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_packer\
      \          = corpusops_localsettings_packer           | default(False) %}\n\
      {% set corpusops_localsettings_phantoms        = corpusops_localsettings_phantoms\
      \         | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_php          \
      \   = corpusops_localsettings_php              | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_pkgmgr\
      \          = corpusops_localsettings_pkgmgr           | default(True) %}\n{%\
      \ set corpusops_localsettings_profile         = corpusops_localsettings_profile\
      \          | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_python_sni   \
      \   = corpusops_localsettings_python_sni       | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_screen\
      \          = corpusops_localsettings_screen           | default(True) %}\n{%\
      \ set corpusops_localsettings_ssh             = corpusops_localsettings_ssh\
      \              | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_sudo     \
      \       = corpusops_localsettings_sudo             | default(True) %}\n{% set\
      \ corpusops_localsettings_supervisor      = corpusops_localsettings_supervisor\
      \       | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_sysctls        \
      \ = corpusops_localsettings_sysctls          | default(not is_docker) %}\n{%\
      \ set corpusops_localsettings_timezone        = corpusops_localsettings_timezone\
      \         | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_vim           \
      \  = corpusops_localsettings_vim              | default(not is_docker) %}\n\
      {% set corpusops_localsettings_ovh_rtm         = corpusops_localsettings_ovh_rtm\
      \          | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_monitoring  \
      \    = corpusops_localsettings_monitoring       | default(False) %}\n{% set\
      \ corpusops_localsettings_burp            = corpusops_localsettings_burp   \
      \          | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_backup_dbsmartbackup\
      \ = corpusops_services_backup_dbsmartbackup  | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_base_cron\
      \            = corpusops_services_base_cron             | default(True) %}\n\
      {% set corpusops_services_base_ntp             = corpusops_services_base_ntp\

      \       | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_db_mysql_client      =\
      \ corpusops_services_db_mysql_client       | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_db_mysql\
      \             = corpusops_services_db_mysql              | default(False) %}\n\
      {% set corpusops_services_db_mysql_pkgmgr      = corpusops_services_db_mysql_pkgmgr\
      \       | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_db_postgis          \
      \ = corpusops_services_db_postgis            | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_db_postgresql_client\
      \ = corpusops_services_db_postgresql_client  | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_db_postgresql\
      \        = corpusops_services_db_postgresql         | default(False) %}\n{%\

      \  | default(False) %}\n{% set corpusops_services_firewall_ms_iptables = corpusops_services_firewall_ms_iptables\

      \     | default(bionic_and_later and not is_docker) %}\n{% set corpusops_sslcerts\
      \                      = corpusops_sslcerts                       | default(True)\
      \ %}\n{% set corpusops_sshkeys                       = corpusops_sshkeys   \
      \                     | default(True) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_dns_servers\
      \     = corpusops_localsettings_dns_servers      | default([]) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_dns_search\
      \      = corpusops_localsettings_dns_search       | default([]) %}\n{% set corpusops_localsettings_apparmor\
      \        = corpusops_localsettings_apparmor\n                              \

      \ == 'Ubuntu' and not is_container)\n                                      \
      \                                                    | ternary(True, False)\
      \ %}\n{% set corpusops_services_firewall_fail2ban    = corpusops_services_firewall_fail2ban\n\

      \ | length > 0 %}\nprovision_corpusops_do_ms_iptables_registrations: {{ corpusops_do_ms_iptables_registrations\
      \ }}\nprovision_corpusops_do_certbot: {{ corpusops_do_certbot }}\nprovision_corpusops_do_haproxy_registrations:\

8363.oscript:
- name: Install necessary packages
  ansible.builtin.apt:
    name: "{{ item }} update_cache=yes cache_valid_time=86400 install-recommends=no"
    state: present
  with_items:
    - autoconf
    - automake
    - g++
    - libtool
    - libev-dev
    - libevent-dev
    - libxml2-dev

9318.oscript:
- name: Create security group
  azure.azcollection.azure_rm_securitygroup:
    resource_group: "{{pl_resource_group_name}}"
    name: "{{item.security_group_name}}"
    purge_rules: true
    rules:
      - name: "{{item.rule_name}}"
        protocol: "{{item.protocol}}"
        source_address_prefix: "{{item.source_address_prefix}}"
        description: "{{item.description}}"
        priority: "{{item.priority}}"
        source_port_range: "{{item.source_port}}"
        destination_port_range: "{{item.destination_port}}"
        direction: Inbound
        access: Allow
    state: present
    auth_source: env
  environment:
    AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID: "{{pl_azure_subscription_id}}"
    AZURE_CLIENT_ID: "{{pl_azure_client_id}}"
    AZURE_SECRET: "{{pl_azure_secret}}"
    AZURE_TENANT: "{{pl_azure_tenant}}"
  with_items:
    - security_group_name: "{{pl_security_group_name}}"
      description: Inbound SSH Access
      rule_name: ALLOW_SSH
      source_address_prefix: 0.0.0.0/0
      protocol: Tcp
      source_port: 0-65535
      destination_port: "22"
      priority: "100"

9900.oscript:
- name: Create inventory
  inventory:
    name: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.name | mandatory }}"
    copy_from: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.copy_from | default(omit, true) }}"
    description: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.description | default(omit, true)\
      \ }}"
    organization: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.organization.name | default( __controller_inventory_item.organization\
      \ ) | mandatory }}"
    instance_groups: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.instance_groups | default(omit,\
      \ true) }}"
    variables: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.variables | default(omit, true) | regex_replace('[\
      \ ]{2,}','') }}"
    kind: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.kind | default(omit, true) }}"
    host_filter: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.host_filter | default(omit, true)\
      \ }}"
    state: "{{ __controller_inventory_item.state | default(controller_state | default('present'))\
      \ }}"
    controller_config_file: "{{ controller_config_file | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_host: "{{ controller_hostname | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_username: "{{ controller_username | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_password: "{{ controller_password | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_oauthtoken: "{{ controller_oauthtoken | default(omit, true) }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ controller_validate_certs | default(omit) }}"
  loop: "{{ controller_inventories }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: __controller_inventory_item
  no_log: "{{ controller_configuration_inventories_secure_logging }}"
  async: 1000
  poll: 0
  register: __inventories_job_async
  changed_when: not __inventories_job_async.changed
  vars:
    ansible_async_dir: /tmp/.ansible_async

11472.oscript:
- name: Install Pipx
  ansible.builtin.shell: "if ! {{ pipx_python_path_installer }} -m pip list --format\
    \ freeze | grep -q pipx=={{ pipx_version }}; then
  {{ pipx_python_path_installer\
    \ }} -m pip install pipx=={{ pipx_version }}

  if ! {{ pipx_python_path_installer\
    \ }} -m pip list --format freeze | grep -q pipx=={{ pipx_version }}; then
  \
    \  exit 1
  else
    echo status=changed
  fi
fi

if ! {{ pipx_python_path_installer\
    \ }} -m pip list --format freeze | grep -q pipx=={{ pipx_version }}; then
  exit\
    \ 1
fi
"
  register: task
  changed_when: "'status=changed' in task.stdout"

name configure access control policy at.prompt: name configure access control policy attachments

13715.oscript:
- name: Configure access control policy attachments
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.access_control.policy_attachments.config
    isamapi: "{{ item }}"
  when: item is defined
  with_items: "{{ access_control_policy_resources }}"
  notify: Commit Changes

13716.oscript:
- name: Configure access control policy attachments
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    adminProxyProtocol: "{{ adminProxyProtocol | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyHostname: "{{ adminProxyHostname | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyPort: "{{ adminProxyPort | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyApplianceShortName: "{{ adminProxyApplianceShortName | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    omitAdminProxy: "{{ omitAdminProxy | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ port | default(omit) }}"
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.access_control.policy_attachments.update_attachments
    isamapi: "{{ item }}"
  when: item is defined
  with_items: "{{ access_control_policy_attachments }}"

16453.oscript:
- name: Avi ServerAutoScalePolicy | Create or Update ServerAutoScalePolicy
  community.network.network.avi.avi_serverautoscalepolicy:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    delay_for_server_garbage_collection: "{{ item.delay_for_server_garbage_collection\
      \ | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    intelligent_autoscale: "{{ item.intelligent_autoscale | default(omit) }}"
    intelligent_scalein_margin: "{{ item.intelligent_scalein_margin | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    intelligent_scaleout_margin: "{{ item.intelligent_scaleout_margin | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    labels: "{{ item.labels | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    max_scalein_adjustment_step: "{{ item.max_scalein_adjustment_step | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    max_scaleout_adjustment_step: "{{ item.max_scaleout_adjustment_step | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    max_size: "{{ item.max_size | default(omit) }}"
    min_size: "{{ item.min_size | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    scalein_alertconfig_refs: "{{ item.scalein_alertconfig_refs | default(omit) }}"
    scalein_cooldown: "{{ item.scalein_cooldown | default(omit) }}"
    scaleout_alertconfig_refs: "{{ item.scaleout_alertconfig_refs | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    scaleout_cooldown: "{{ item.scaleout_cooldown | default(omit) }}"
    scheduled_scalings: "{{ item.scheduled_scalings | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    use_predicted_load: "{{ item.use_predicted_load | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.serverautoscalepolicy | default([]) }}"

    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    events: "{{ item.events | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    node_uuid: "{{ item.node_uuid | default(omit) }}"
    operation: "{{ item.operation | default(omit) }}"
    phase: "{{ item.phase | default(omit) }}"
    status: "{{ item.status | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"

21861.oscript:
- name: Add a Federation - {{ add_federation_name }}
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.fed.federations.add
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ add_federation_name }}"
      protocol: "{{ add_federation_protocol }}"
      role: ibm.isam.         "{{ add_federation_role }}"
      configuration: "{{ add_federation_configuration }}"
      templateName: "{{ add_federation_templateName }}"
  when:
    - add_federation_name is defined
    - add_federation_protocol is defined
    - add_federation_role is defined
    - add_federation_configuration is defined
    - add_federation_templateName is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Reload Liberty Runtime

21862.oscript:

    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.fed.federations.add
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ add_federation_name }}"
      protocol: "{{ add_federation_protocol }}"
      role: "{{ add_federation_role }}"
      configuration: "{{ add_federation_configuration }}"
      templateName: "{{ add_federation_templateName }}"
  when:
    - add_federation_name is defined
    - add_federation_protocol is defined
    - add_federation_role is defined
    - add_federation_configuration is defined
    - add_federation_templateName is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Reload Liberty Runtime

    api_host: "{{ item.api_host|default('localhost') }}"
    password: "{{ item.password }}"
    memory: "{{ item.memory|default('512') }}"
    swap: "{{ item.swap|default('0')}}"
    disk: "{{ item.disk|default('3') }}"
    hostname: "{{ item.hostname }}"
    nameserver: "{{ item.nameserver }}"
    searchdomain: "{{ item.searchdomain }}"
    onboot: "{{ item.onboot|default(omit)}}"
    mounts: "{{ item.mounts|default(omit) }}"

- name: Add Plugin dependencies reposito.prompt: name install bacula enteprise plugin for storage daemon dependencies

24693.oscript:
- name: Install Bacula Enteprise plugin for Storage Daemon dependencies
  community.general.zypper:
    name: "{{ dependency_item.1.package_dependency_name }}"
    state: latest
  loop: "{{ plugins_dependencies|subelements('dependencies') }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: dependency_item
  when:
    - ((sdplugin is defined and dependency_item.0.plugin_name == sdplugin) or (fdplugin
      is defined and dependency_item.0.plugin_name == fdplugin))
    - bee_version is version(dependency_item.1.bee_version, dependency_item.1.operator)
      and dependency_item.1.os_distribution == ansible_distribution
    - dependency_item.1.os_distribution_major_version == ansible_distribution_major_version|int

    state: "present\n"

    - regexp: network\.host

      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "{{ lookup('env','NGINX_CRT') | b64decode }}"
        dest: ../../files/license/nginx-repo.crt
        force: false
        mode: 292
    - name: Create ephemeral license key file from b64 decoded env var
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "{{ lookup('env','NGINX_KEY') | b64decode }}"
        dest: ../../files/license/nginx-repo.key

25085.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create Raspberry Pi groups
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: "{{ item }}"
      loop:
        - adm
        - dialout
        - cdrom
        - sudo
        - audio
        - video
        - plugdev
        - games
        - users
        - input
        - netdev
        - spi
        - i2c
        - gpio

25086.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: kibana
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Install Elasticsearch
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: elasticsearch

25089.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    murmur_sslcert: /etc/ssl/mumble-server-cert.pem
    murmur_sslkey: /etc/ssl/mumble-server-key.pem
    nodejs_install_npm_user: root
  tasks:
    - name: Install OpenSSL
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        pkg: openssl
        cache_valid_time: 3600
    - name: Create self-signed SSL cert
      ansible.builtin.command: openssl req -new -nodes -x509 -subj "/C=US/ST=Oregon/L=Portland/O=IT/CN=${ansible_fqdn}"
        -days 3650 -keyout {{ murmur_sslkey }} -out {{ murmur_sslcert }} -extensions
        v3_ca
      args:
        creates: "{{ murmur_sslcert }}"

25091.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create auth.log otherwise fail2ban won't run
      ansible.builtin.file:
        group: root
        mode: 420
        owner: root
        path: "{{ item }}"
        state: touch
      become: true
      loop:
        - /var/log/auth.log
        - /var/log/nginx_error.log

25092.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Enable EPEL for CentOS 7
      ansible.builtin.yum:
        name: epel-release
        state: present
      when: ansible_distribution == "CentOS" and ansible_distribution_major_version
        == "7"

25094.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install_python
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: mariancraciun1983.install_python
      when: install_python3|bool
    - name: Corosync_pacemaker
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: mariancraciun1983.corosync_pacemaker
      when: install_corosync|bool

25095.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install dependencies
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name:
          - conntrack
          - iproute
          - ethtool
          - socat
        state: present
      when:
        - ansible_distribution in [ "RedHat", "CentOS", "Amazon", "Rocky", "AlmaLinux",
          "Fedora" ]
    - name: Install dependencies
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name:
          - conntrack
          - iproute2
          - ethtool
          - socat
        state: present
      when:
        - ansible_os_family == "Debian"

25097.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  collections:
    - ansible.builtin
    - community.rabbitmq
  tasks:
    - name: Install requests library
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: py3-requests
        state: present
    - name: Create user admin
      community.rabbitmq.rabbitmq_user:
        user: admin
        password: password
        tags: administrator,monitoring
        configure_priv: .*
        read_priv: .*
        write_priv: .*
    - name: Create user user
      community.rabbitmq.rabbitmq_user:
        name: user

25098.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: false
  roles:
    - role: robertdebock.bootstrap
  tasks:
    - name: Create a file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        dest: /tmp/some_file.txt
        content: Some content
        mode: "0644"

25100.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Create /dev/net
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /dev/net
        state: directory
    - name: Create tun filesystem node
      ansible.builtin.command: mknod /dev/net/tun c 10 200
      args:
        creates: /dev/net/tun

25104.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: rhel
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Subscribe vagrant box to redhat
      community.general.redhat_subscription:
        state: present
        activationkey: "{{ rhel_activationkey }}"
        org_id: "{{ rhel_org_id }}"

25106.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install locales package
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: locales
        state: present
    - name: Enable UTF8
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        dest: /etc/locale.gen
        regexp: ^#\s+en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8
        line: en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8
    - name: Regenerate localedb
      ansible.builtin.command: localedef -i en_US -f UTF-8 en_US.UTF-8

25108.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  vars:
    hetzner_installimage_robot_api_base_url: http://hetzner-robot:3000
  tasks:
    - name: Add fake hetzner_installimage_provisioned.flag file
      ansible.builtin.raw: echo 'test' > /etc/hetzner_installimage_provisioned.flag
    - name: Include default prepare tasks
      ansible.builtin.include: ../resources/tasks/prepare-default.yml

25109.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Read cpuset to find out my own container id
      ansible.builtin.shell:
        cmd: cat /proc/1/cpuset | grep docker | tail -1 | sed "s/^.*\///" | tr -d
          "-" | sed "s/docker//" | cut -c 1-12
      changed_when: false
      register: readed
    - name: Attach to target network
      community.docker.docker_network:
        name: "{{ lookup('env', 'NETWORK') }}"
        appends: true
        connected:
          - "{{ readed.stdout }}"

25110.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: all
  roles:
    - role: proxy_settings
    - role: anacron
  tasks:
    - name: Install sudo(is absent in centos 8 docker image by default)
      ansible.builtin.dnf:
        name: sudo
        state: present

25112.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  roles:
    - role: amtega.apache
      vars:
        apache_aditional_modules: []
  tasks:
    - name: Create a index.php with phpinfo
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        dest: /var/www/html/index.php
        content: "<?php\n  phpinfo();\n?>\n"
        mode: 420
    - name: Check that apache is listening
      ansible.builtin.wait_for:
        port: 80
        timeout: 10

25117.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Run whoami to make molecule prepare for windows happy
      ansible.windows.win_whoami: null

25120.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Update APT cache
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
      when: ansible_distribution == 'Ubuntu'
      become: true
    - rpm_key:
        state: present
        key: https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/RPM-GPG-KEY-EPEL-8
      when: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
      become: true
    - name: Install EPEL repository
      ansible.builtin.yum:
        name: https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-{{ ansible_distribution_major_version
          }}.noarch.rpm
        state: present
      when: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
      become: true

25121.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Change CentOS mirror
      ansible.builtin.script: /provision/scripts/change_centos_mirror.sh
      when: 'ansible_distribution == "CentOS" and ansible_distribution_major_version
        == "7"

        '
    - name: Change Ubuntu1804 mirror
      ansible.builtin.script: /provision/scripts/change_ubuntu1804_mirror.sh
      when: 'ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_distribution_version ==
        "18.04"

        '
    - name: Change Debian9 mirror
      ansible.builtin.script: /provision/scripts/change_debian9_mirror.sh
      when: ansible_distribution == "Debian" and ansible_distribution_major_version
        == "9"

25122.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars_files:
    - ../env.yml
  tasks:
    - name: This Docker Test is skipped
      ansible.builtin.debug: Skipped

25124.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install packages which are usually present
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
        name:
          - locales
          - tzdata
          - apt-transport-https
          - ssl-cert
    - name: Create dirs missing in docker image
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /run/lock/
        state: directory
        mode: 493
    - name: Genereate snakeoil certs
      ansible.builtin.command: make-ssl-cert generate-default-snakeoil
      args:
        creates: /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key

25125.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install openssl
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: openssl
    - name: Generate psk
      ansible.builtin.shell: openssl rand -hex 32 > /etc/opt/zabbix_agentd.psk

25130.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install requirements
      ansible.builtin.import_role:
        name: gabops.packages_os
      vars:
        packages_os:
          fedora_31:
            python3-libselinux: present
    - name: Create groups
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: devops
    - name: Create users
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: "{{ item }}"
      loop:
        - john.doe
        - jenkins

25131.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create group
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: dan
    - name: Create user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: dan
        group: dan
    - name: Update the package cache
      ansible.builtin.package:
        update_cache: true

25135.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: true
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Setup service script
      ansible.builtin.template:
        src: "{{ ansible_facts.distribution_major_version is version(\"8\", \"<\"\
          )\n   | ternary(\"foo_python2.py.j2\", \"foo_python3.py.j2\") }}"
        dest: /usr/bin/foo{{ test_systemd_services_service_item }}.py
        mode: a+x
      loop: "{{ range(4) | list }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: test_systemd_services_service_item
    - name: Setup systemd service config
      ansible.builtin.template:
        src: foo.service.j2
        dest: "{{ \"/usr/lib/systemd/system/foo\"\n   ~ test_systemd_services_service_item\n\
          \   ~ \".service\" }}"
        mode: 420
      when: ansible_facts.distribution_major_version is version("6", ">")
      loop: "{{ range(4) | list }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: test_systemd_services_service_item

25137.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Ensure sudo is installed on all platforms
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name:
          - sudo
          - gcc
        state: present
    - name: Create molecule user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: pandemonium

25138.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Bootstrap python2 to avoid gather_facts errors
      ansible.builtin.raw: "{{ item }}"
      loop:
        - apt-get update
        - apt-get install -y sudo
        - apt-get -y install python
    - name: Install sudo so we can become as gods
      ansible.builtin.raw: "{{ item }}"
      loop:
        - apt-get install -y sudo

25141.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create test user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: test-user
        groups: sudo
        state: present
    - name: Give passwordless sudo to sudoers
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        path: /etc/sudoers
        state: present
        regexp: ^%sudo ALL=
        line: "%sudo ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL"
        validate: /usr/sbin/visudo -cf %s

25143.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: all
  roles:
    - ivansible.linux.core
    - ivansible.nginx.nginx
  tasks:
    - name: Stop exim from taking port 25 on github runners
      ansible.builtin.systemd:
        name: exim4
        state: stopped
        masked: true
      become: true
      failed_when: false
      when: ansible_connection == 'local'

25144.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Set CN fact
      ansible.builtin.set_fact:
        cn: "{{ 10000|random }}"

25146.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Create /boot/firmware directory
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /boot/firmware
        state: directory
        recurse: true
        mode: 493
    - name: Create /boot/firmware/cmdline.txt
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        dest: /boot/firmware/cmdline.txt
        content: net.ifnames=0 dwc_otg.lpm_enable=0 console=serial0,115200 console=tty1
          root=LABEL=writable rootfstype=ext4 elevator=deadline rootwait fixrtc
        mode: 493

25149.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    apt_packages:
      - python3-setuptools
      - tzdata
    pip_package: python3-pip
    pip_executable: pip3
    pip_install_packages:
      - name: docker
    docker_install_compose: true
    users:
      - username: nextcloud
  roles:
    - role: weareinteractive.apt
    - role: geerlingguy.pip
    - role: geerlingguy.docker
  tasks:
    - name: Stop Docker service.
      ansible.builtin.service:
        name: docker
        state: stopped
    - name: Create /etc/docker/daemon.json
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "{\n  \"storage-driver\": \"vfs\"\n}\n"
        dest: /etc/docker/daemon.json
        owner: root
        group: root
    - name: Start Docker service.
      ansible.builtin.service:
        name: docker
        state: started

25153.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  pre_tasks:
    - name: Install gce dependency on controlling host (virtualenv)
      pip:
        name:
          - google-auth
          - jmespath
      delegate_to: 127.0.0.1
    - name: Refresh inventory
      meta: refresh_inventory
  tasks:
    - name: Wait for system to become reachable
      ansible.builtin.wait_for_connection:
        timeout: 60

25154.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Update Ubuntu Apt cache
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
      when: ansible_distribution == 'Ubuntu'
    - name: Ensure gpg-agent is available in testing container
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: gpg-agent
        state: present
      when: ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu"

25156.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Update apt cache
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
        cache_valid_time: 3600
      when: ansible_pkg_mgr == "apt"
    - name: Install EPEL Repo (will only run on EL-based distros)
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: robertdebock.epel

25158.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Replace systemctl with docker-systemctl-replacement - Python 2 | GET_URL
      ansible.builtin.get_url:
        dest: /usr/bin/systemctl
        mode: "0755"
        url: https://github.com/gdraheim/docker-systemctl-replacement/raw/master/files/docker/systemctl.py
      when: ansible_python.version.major == 2
    - name: Replace systemctl with docker-systemctl-replacement - Python 3 | GET_URL
      ansible.builtin.get_url:
        dest: /usr/bin/systemctl
        mode: "0755"
        url: https://github.com/gdraheim/docker-systemctl-replacement/raw/master/files/docker/systemctl3.py
      when: ansible_python.version.major == 3
    - name: Update ca-certificates to fix LetsEncrypt certificate expiration | YUM
      ansible.builtin.yum:
        name: ca-certificates
        state: latest
        update_only: "yes"
      when: ansible_pkg_mgr == "yum"

25159.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Debug task
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        msg: "to jest: {{ ansible_facts['distribution'] }}"
    - name: Install sudo
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: sudo
        state: present
    - name: Install python3
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: python3
        state: present

25160.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create sensu group
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: sensu
    - name: Create sensu user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: sensu
        groups: sensu
    - name: Create /etc/sensu folder
      ansible.builtin.file:
        state: directory
        path: /etc/sensu
        owner: sensu
        group: sensu

25163.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Create users.
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
      with_items:
        - name: lorem
          group: lorem
        - name: ipsum
          group: ipsum
    - name: Pre-create .zshrc for user ipsum.
      ansible.builtin.get_url:
        url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/templates/zshrc.zsh-template
        dest: /home/ipsum/.zshrc
        owner: ipsum
        group: ipsum
    - name: Install packages.
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: "{{ item }}"
        state: present
      with_items:
        - git

25165.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Ping node1
      ansible.builtin.command:
        cmd: ping 192.168.0.1 -c 10
      changed_when: false
    - name: Ping node2
      ansible.builtin.command:
        cmd: ping 192.168.0.2 -c 10
      changed_when: false

25166.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install required packages
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: lvm2
        state: present
    - name: Setup pvm
      community.general.parted:
        align: optimal
        device: /dev/sdb
        number: 1
        part_type: primary
        part_start: 0%
        part_end: 100%
        flags:
          - lvm
        state: present
    - name: Setup LVM volume group
      community.general.lvg:
        vg: testing
        pvs: /dev/sdb1
        pesize: "4"
        state: present

25167.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Do not used default molecule prepare task
      ansible.windows.win_shell: echo "nothing to do"

25170.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: "{{ lookup('env', 'DEVAP_TEST_PLATFORM') | default('all') }}"
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Create test user1
      ansible.builtin.user:
        create_home: true
        system: false
        state: present
        name: test1
      become: true
    - name: Create test user2
      ansible.builtin.user:
        create_home: true
        system: false
        state: present
        name: test2
      become: true

25173.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Update apt cache
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
      become: true
      when: ansible_os_family == 'Debian'
    - name: Create fakegroup
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: fakegroup
        state: present
    - name: Create fake conf file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: Test file
        dest: /etc/fakefile.conf
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: 384

25177.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install a package that have a suid/sgid file
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: screen
        state: present
      when: not ( ansible_facts['distribution'] == 'CentOS' and ansible_facts['distribution_major_version']
        == '8')
    - name: Create a suid file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        dest: /tmp/suid_file
        content: Hello World
        mode: 2048
    - name: Create a sgid file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        dest: /tmp/suid_file
        content: Hello World
        mode: 1024

25180.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Nothing to prepare
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that: true

25182.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install required packages
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name:
          - openssh-server
          - sudo
        state: present
    - name: Start service
      ansible.builtin.service:
        name: sshd
        state: started

25188.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install CentOS 7 repository on RedHat 7 to avoid Subscription Manager
        dependencies
      ansible.builtin.yum_repository:
        name: base
        description: CentOS-7 - Base
        file: CentOS-Base.repo
        baseurl: http://mirror.centos.org/centos/7/os/$basearch/
        enabled: true
        gpgcheck: false
      when: "ansible_os_family == 'RedHat' and ansible_distribution == 'RedHat' and\
        \ ansible_distribution_major_version == '7'\n"
    - name: Install RedHat 8 yajl package from mirror.centos.org to avoid Subscription
        Manager dependencies
      ansible.builtin.dnf:
        name: http://mirror.centos.org/centos/8/AppStream/x86_64/os/Packages/yajl-2.1.0-10.el8.x86_64.rpm
        state: present
      when: "ansible_os_family == 'RedHat' and ansible_distribution == 'RedHat' and\
        \ ansible_distribution_major_version == '8'\n"

25190.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Install Python for Ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: test -e /usr/bin/python || (apt -y update && apt install
        -y python-minimal python-zipstream)
      become: true
      changed_when: false
    - name: Install apt-transport-https, lsb-release, net-tools
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name:
          - apt-transport-https
          - gpg
          - lsb-release
          - net-tools
          - python3-setuptools
          - unzip
        update_cache: true
      become: true
    - name: Symlink pip3 for TestInfra
      ansible.builtin.file:
        dest: /usr/bin/pip
        force: true
        mode: 489
        src: /usr/bin/pip3
        state: link
      become: true

25191.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: cerebro
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Limits on mmap counts
      ansible.posix.sysctl:
        name: vm.max_map_count
        value: 262144
        sysctl_set: true
        state: present
        reload: true
    - name: Install Elasticsearch
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: elasticsearch

25192.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install pip.
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: python-pip
        state: present
    - name: Install pyOpenSSL.
      ansible.builtin.pip:
        name: pyOpenSSL
        state: present

25193.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: localhost
  tasks:
    - name: Add instance4 to etcd group
      ansible.builtin.add_host:
        name: instance4
        groups:
          - etcd
      changed_when: false

25200.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  handlers:
    - import_tasks: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../tests/handlers/main.yml"
  tasks:
    - name: Include vars
      ansible.builtin.include_vars: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../defaults/main.yml"
    - name: Include vars
      ansible.builtin.include_vars: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../tests/vars/main.yml"
    - name: Include tasks
      ansible.builtin.include: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../tests/tasks/pre.yml"

25206.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: FreeBSD | Install Ansible requirements
      community.general.pkgng:
        name: gtar, unzip
        state: present

25207.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    block_devices:
      - device: /dev/loop0
        backing: /tmp/loop0
      - device: /dev/loop1
        backing: /tmp/loop1
  tasks:
    - name: Import diagnostics tasks
      ansible.builtin.import_tasks: tasks/diagnostics.yml
    - name: Create files to back the block devices
      ansible.builtin.command: dd if=/dev/zero of="{{ item.backing }}" bs=1024k count=100
      args:
        creates: "{{ item.backing }}"
      with_items: "{{ block_devices }}"
    - name: Create loopback devices
      ansible.builtin.command: losetup {{ item.device }} "{{ item.backing }}"
      with_items: "{{ block_devices }}"
      become: true

25208.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Archlinux | Update pacman cache
      community.general.pacman:
        update_cache: true
      when: ansible_pkg_mgr == "pacman"
    - name: Linux | Create rootless user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: johnd
        comment: John Doe
        state: present

25209.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  roles:
    - role: buluma.bootstrap
    - role: buluma.core_dependencies
  tasks:
    - name: Set authorized keys for root
      ansible.posix.authorized_key:
        user: root
        state: present
        key: ssh-rsa XYZYX54321

25217.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Ensure bzip2 is installed
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: bzip2
        state: present
      become: true
    - name: Ensure cron is installed
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: cronie
        state: present
      become: true
      when: ansible_os_family | lower == "redhat"
    - name: Ensure cron is installed
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: cron
        state: present
      become: true
      when:
        - ansible_os_family | lower == "debian"
        - ansible_distribution | lower != "ubuntu"

25218.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Check if connection still works
      ansible.builtin.ping: null

25220.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  tasks:
    - name: Install OS packages
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: unzip
      become: true
    - name: Install netaddr dependency on controlling host
      ansible.builtin.pip:
        name: netaddr
      become: false

25221.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  become: true
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create nomad directories
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item }}"
        state: directory
      loop:
        - /opt/nomad/config.d
    - name: Create dummy files
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item }}"
        state: touch
      loop:
        - /opt/nomad/config.d/dummy.json

25226.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Gather limited facts for hosts file
      ansible.builtin.setup:
        gather_subset:
          - "!all"
          - "!any"
          - network
    - name: Populate hosts file
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        path: /etc/hosts
        line: "{{ hostvars[item].ansible_default_ipv4.address }} {{ item }}"
        unsafe_writes: true
      with_items: "{{ groups.all }}"

25228.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install packages which are usually present
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
        name:
          - locales
          - tzdata
          - apt-transport-https
    - name: Create dirs missing in docker image
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /run/lock/
        state: directory
        mode: 493

25231.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Prepare systemd containers with fake sushell entry
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        path: /usr/lib/systemd/system/rescue.service
        regexp: ^ExecStart
        line: ExecStart=-/bin/sh -c "/usr/sbin/sushell; /usr/bin/systemctl --fail
          --no-block default"
      when: ansible_facts.distribution_major_version is version('7', '>=')

25235.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Initialize package cache
      community.general.pacman:
        update_cache: true
        upgrade: true
      become: true

25240.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Setup LVM physical volume
      ansible.builtin.import_role:
        name: amtega.parted
      vars:
        parted_disks:
          - align: optimal
            device: /dev/sdb
            number: 1
            part_type: primary
            part_start: 0%
            part_end: 100%
            flags:
              - lvm
            state: present

25244.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Check testing directory
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /testdir
      register: test_dir_result
    - name: Setup testing directory
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /testdir
        state: directory
        mode: 511
      when: not test_dir_result.stat.exists

25248.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: haproxy-exporter-test
  pre_tasks:
    - name: Create prometheus group
      group:
        name: prometheus
        system: true
        state: present
  handlers:
    - name: Reload HAProxy
      service:
        name: haproxy
        state: reloaded
  tasks:
    - name: HAProxy install
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: haproxy
        state: present
    - name: HAProxy configuration
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: haproxy.cfg
        dest: /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
        owner: root
        group: root
      notify: Reload HAProxy

25252.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars_files:
    - ../env.yml
  tasks:
    - name: Load role dependancies
      ansible.builtin.include_vars:
        file: ../prepare_roles.yml
        name: dep_roles
      failed_when: false
    - name: Display role dependancies
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        var: dep_role
      loop: "{{ dep_roles.roles }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: dep_role
      when: dep_roles.roles is defined and dep_roles.roles|length>0
    - name: Add the role dependancies
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: "{{ dep_role }}"
      loop: "{{ dep_roles.roles }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: dep_role
      when: dep_roles.roles is defined and dep_roles.roles|length>0

25256.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts_centos_6
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  vars:
    repo_files:
      - CentOS-Base.repo
      - CentOS-Debuginfo.repo
      - CentOS-fasttrack.repo
  tasks:
    - name: Disable repos mirror list
      ansible.builtin.replace:
        path: /etc/yum.repos.d/{{ repo_file }}
        regexp: (^mirrorlist=.*)
        replace: "#\\1"
      loop: "{{ repo_files }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: repo_file
    - name: Point repos to vault
      ansible.builtin.replace:
        path: /etc/yum.repos.d/{{ repo_file }}
        regexp: "#baseurl=http://mirror.centos.org/"
        replace: baseurl=http://vault.centos.org/
      loop: "{{ repo_files }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: repo_file
    - name: Setup python for ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: yum install -y libselinux-python
      when: true

25261.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Creates directory for java
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /usr/share/man/man1
        state: directory
    - name: Update cache
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        update_cache: true
      when: ansible_os_family == "Debian"
      changed_when: false
      failed_when: false

25265.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: false
  roles:
    - role: buluma.bootstrap
  tasks:
    - name: Install apt-transport-https ca-certificates
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: "{{ item }}"
      loop:
        - apt-transport-https
        - ca-certificates
    - name: Install yarn public key
      ansible.builtin.apt_key:
        url: https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg
        validate_certs: false

25267.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Include vars
      ansible.builtin.include_vars: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../tests/vars/main.yml"
    - name: Include tasks
      ansible.builtin.include: "{{ playbook_dir }}/../../tests/tasks/pre.yml"

25269.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Prepare | Install python for Ansible (Debian)
      ansible.builtin.raw: (test -e /usr/bin/python || (apt -y update && apt install
        -y python3-minimal))
      changed_when: false
      ignore_errors: true
    - name: Prepare | Apt update&upgrade
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        upgrade: dist
        update_cache: true
      register: apt_prepare_res
      until: apt_prepare_res is success
      retries: 6
    - name: Install debugging tools
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name:
          - net-tools
          - nano
        state: present

25270.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create test group
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: test_group
      become: true
    - name: Create test user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: test_user
        home: /home/test_user
        createhome: true
        group: test_group
      become: true

25271.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: debian
  tasks:
    - name: Setup mirror
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: ./mirrors/{{ inventory_hostname }}.list
        dest: /etc/apt/sources.list
      become: true
      when: lookup('env','mirror') == 'true'
    - name: Clean apt
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        autoclean: true
        update_cache: true
      become: true
      when: lookup('env','mirror') == 'true'

25274.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Install python for Ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: test -e /usr/bin/python3 || (apt -y update && apt install
        -y python3-minimal)
      become: true
      changed_when: false
    - name: Install
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name:
          - grub-pc
          - ibus
          - ufw
        state: present
        update_cache: true
      become: true

25276.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_prepare_hosts
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Create temporary directory
      ansible.builtin.tempfile:
        state: directory
        suffix: tmp
      register: create_tempdir_result
    - name: Copy certificate examples
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: "{{ cert.artifact.file }}"
        dest: "{{ create_tempdir_result.path }}"
        mode: "0644"
      vars:
        reference_host: "{{ groups['molecule_hosts'] | first }}"
      loop: "{{ hostvars[reference_host].ca_certificates }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: cert
        label: "{{ cert.alias }}"
    - name: Publish certificate examples via http port 8000
      ansible.builtin.shell: nohup {{ http_server_invocation }} &
      vars:
        http_server_invocation: '{{ (ansible_facts.distribution | lower in ["centos",
          "redhat"] and ansible_facts.distribution_major_version is version("7", "="))
          | ternary(''python2 -m SimpleHTTPServer'', ''python3 -m http.server'') }}'
      args:
        chdir: "{{ create_tempdir_result.path }}"
      changed_when: true
      register: http_server_invocation_result

25277.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Create test users
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: "{{ item }}"
        home: /home/{{ item }}
        createhome: true
      become: true
      with_items:
        - test_usr1
        - test_usr2
    - name: Install console-setup file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: tests/console-setup.sh
        dest: /etc/default/console-setup
        force: false
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: u=rwx,go=r
      become: true

25279.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Create lopback file
      ansible.builtin.command: dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/loopbackfile.img bs=1M count=10
    - name: Setup loop device
      ansible.builtin.command: losetup -fP /tmp/loopbackfile.img
    - set_fact:
        block_device: /root/loopbackfile.img

25280.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Create Test Log File
      ansible.builtin.shell: touch /var/log/molecule-test-output.log && chmod 777
        /var/log/molecule-test-output.log
      become: true
      args:
        creates: /var/log/molecule-test-output.log

25286.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install required packages
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name:
          - php-cli
          - php-json
          - php-pdo
          - php-mysqlnd
          - sudo
          - mariadb
        state: present
    - name: Create document root
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /var/www/html
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: 493
        recurse: true
        state: directory
    - name: Create WordPress user
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: wordpress
        system: true
        state: present

25288.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  vars_files:
    - ../../roles/encrypt_private_keys/defaults/main.yml
  tasks:
    - name: Install dependencies
      ansible.builtin.include_role:
        name: klusters.tls.packages
    - name: Create certs dirs
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ tls_keys_path }}"
        state: directory
        mode: 493
    - name: Gen private key
      community.crypto.openssl_privatekey:
        path: "{{ tls_key }}"

25293.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install needed dependencies for role testing (redhat)
      ansible.builtin.yum:
        name:
          - java-1.8.0-openjdk-headless
          - httpd
          - mod_ssl
          - rsync
        state: present
      when: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
    - name: Install needed dependencie for role testing (debian/ubuntu)
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: "{{ item }}"
        state: present
        update_cache: true
      with_items:
        - apache2
        - openjdk-8-jre-headless
        - rsync
    - name: Enable needed apache modules
      ansible.builtin.shell: a2enmod ssl rewrite proxy proxy_http headers

25297.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: false
  vars_files:
    - vars.yml
  tasks:
    - name: Create absent groups
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        gid: "{{ item.gid | default(omit) }}"
        state: present
      loop: "{{ users_groups_list }}"
      when: item.state | default("present") == "absent"
    - name: Create user groups of absent users
      ansible.builtin.group:
        name: "{{ item.group | default(item.username) }}"
        gid: "{{ item.gid | default(item.uid) | default(omit) }}"
        state: present
      loop: "{{ users_user_list }}"
      when: item.state | default("present") == "absent"
    - name: Create absent users
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: "{{ item.username }}"
        uid: "{{ item.uid | default(omit) }}"
        group: "{{ item.group | default(item.username) }}"
        groups: "{{ item.groups | default(omit) }}"
        shell: "{{ item.shell | default(omit) }}"
        password: "{{ item.password | password_hash('sha512', users_password_salt)\
          \ if item.password is defined else '!' }}"
        state: present
      loop: "{{ users_user_list }}"
      when: item.state | default("present") == "absent"

25302.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: agent
  tasks:
    - name: Apt-update
      ansible.builtin.shell: apt-get update
      args:
        warn: false
      when:
        - ansible_os_family == "Debian"
    - name: Installing tools on Debian
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name:
          - net-tools
          - apt-transport-https
          - sudo
          - apt-utils
          - ca-certificates
          - "{{ 'gnupg-agent' if ansible_distribution_major_version in ['8', '16']\
            \ else 'gpg-agent' }}"
        state: present
      when:
        - ansible_os_family == "Debian"

25303.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: molecule_hosts_centos
  gather_facts: false
  become: true
  vars:
    ansible_python_interpreter: "{{ (inventory_hostname in groups.molecule_hosts_centos_7)\n\
      \   | ternary(\"/usr/bin/python\", \"/usr/bin/python3\") }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Setup python
      ansible.builtin.raw: yum install -y {{ ansible_python_interpreter | basename
        }}
      when: true
      args:
        warn: false
    - name: Update system
      ansible.builtin.command: yum update -y
      when: true
      args:
        warn: false
    - name: Reboot machine
      ansible.builtin.reboot: null

25308.oscript:
- name: prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Install openssl
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: openssl
        state: present
      become: true
    - name: Upload the source file
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: localhost.localdomain.crt
        dest: /root
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: 420
      become: true

25309.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Enable PowerTools repo on CentOS 8
      ansible.builtin.replace:
        path: /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Linux-PowerTools.repo
        regexp: ^enabled=0$
        replace: enabled=1
      when:
        - ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
        - ansible_distribution_version.split('.')[0] == '8'

25313.oscript:
- name: Prepare
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Install python for Ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: test -e /usr/bin/python || (apt -y update && apt install
        -y python-minimal)
      become: true
      changed_when: false
    - name: Install pip.
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name: python-pip
        update_cache: true
      become: true
    - name: Create user.
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: jenkins
        home: /var/lib/jenkins
      become: true
