            LockedOut: false
            Name: ansible_test_user-b
            SamAccountName: ansible_test_user-b
            Surname: null
            UserPrincipalName: ansible_test_user-b@test.local
          ansible_test_user-c:
            City: Teruel
            Company: Acme
            Description: Test user ansible_test_user-c please erase me.
            DistinguishedName: CN=ansible_test_user-c,OU=Test,DC=test,DC=local
            EmailAddress: dont_ask@dont_respond.never.com
            Enabled: true
            GivenName: Jane
            LockedOut: false
            Name: ansible_test_user-c
            SamAccountName: ansible_test_user-c
            Surname: Doe
            UserPrincipalName: ansible_test_user-c@test.local
          ansible_test_user-e:
            City: springfield

46617.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Retrieve the file information for '/home/testuser/.ssh/authorized_keys'.
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /home/testuser/.ssh/authorized_keys
      register: remote_file
    - name: Test that the '/home/testuser/.ssh/authorized_keys' file was created correctly.
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - remote_file.stat.exists
          - remote_file.stat.isreg
          - remote_file.stat.path == '/home/testuser/.ssh/authorized_keys'
          - remote_file.stat.mode == '0600'
    - name: Check ssh public key.
      ansible.posix.authorized_key:
        user: testuser
        state: present
        key: "{{ lookup('file', 'files/testuser.pub') }}"
      check_mode: true

  become: true
  tasks:

      ansible.builtin.command: /opt/zookeeper/bin/zkServer.sh status
      register: zoo_status
      changed_when: false
    - name: Check service running
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: Zookeeper service not running
      when:
        - "'Error contacting service. It is probably not running.' in zoo_status.stdout"
    - name: Check mode status
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: Zookeeper mode is not standalone
      when:
        - "'Mode: leader' not in zoo_status.stdout and 'Mode: follower' not in zoo_status.stdout"

46635.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  become: true
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    python_pip_os_packages_map:
      CentOS-7:
        - python2-pip
        - python-setuptools
      RedHat-7:
        - python2-pip
        - python-setuptools
      Amazon-2:
        - python2-pip
        - python2-setuptools
      default:
        - python3-pip
        - python3-setuptools
    python_pip_os_packages: "{{ python_pip_os_packages_map[ansible_distribution ~\
      \ '-' ~ ansible_distribution_major_version] | default(python_pip_os_packages_map['default']\
      \ ) }}"
    python_pip_package_map:
      RedHat-7: pip==20.3.4
      CentOS-7: pip==20.3.4
      default: pip
    python_pip_package: "{{ python_pip_package_map[ansible_distribution ~ '-' ~ ansible_distribution_major_version]\
      \ | default(python_pip_package_map['default'] ) }}"
    python_pip_venv_packages:
      - wheel
      - virtualenv
    python_pip_packages:
      - python-dateutil
    python_pip_venvs:
      - name: fullExample
        python: python
        path: /opt
        packages:
          - python-dateutil
        extra_args: --no-compile
        state: latest
      - name: minExample
        python: python
        path: /opt
      - name: mixExample
        python: python
        path: /opt
        state: latest
  tasks:
    - name: SmokeTests
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        msg:
          - ansible_version => {{ansible_version}}
          - ansible_distribution => {{ ansible_distribution }}
          - ansible_distribution_major_version => {{ ansible_distribution_major_version
            }}
          - ansible_os_family  => {{ ansible_os_family}}
          - ansible_system  => {{ ansible_system }}
    - name: Check installed python os packages
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: "{{ python_pip_os_packages }}"
        state: present
      check_mode: true
      register: molecule_debian_molecule
      failed_when: (molecule_debian_molecule is changed) or (molecule_debian_molecule
        is failed)
    - name: Install packages via pip
      ansible.builtin.pip:
        name: "{{ python_pip_venv_packages }}"
        state: present
      check_mode: true
      register: molecule_pip_packages
      failed_when: (molecule_pip_packages is changed) or (molecule_pip_packages is
        failed)

46637.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Projector executable exists
      ansible.builtin.command:
        cmd: which projector
      changed_when: false
      register: which_projector
    - name: Assertions
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - which_projector.rc == 0
          - which_projector.stdout == "/usr/local/bin/projector"
    - name: Test IDEs
      ansible.builtin.uri:
        url: http://127.0.0.1:{{ item }}/
        status_code: 200
      loop:
        - 9876
        - 9999

46653.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: instance*
  gather_facts: false
  vars:
    code_server_user: root
    code_server_bind_addr: 127.0.0.1:8080
    code_server_password: plaintextPassword
  tasks:
    - name: Check code-server configuration
      ansible.builtin.template:
        src: config.yaml.j2
        dest: /root/.config/code-server/config.yaml
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: 420
      check_mode: true
      register: code_server_verify
      failed_when: code_server_verify.changed
    - name: Check if service is enabled and started
      ansible.builtin.service:
        name: code-server@root
        state: started
        enabled: true
      check_mode: true
      register: code_server_verify
    - name: Check that port 8080 is open
      ansible.builtin.wait_for:
        port: 8080

46654.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  become: false
  tasks:
    - name: Run ifconfig
      ansible.builtin.command:
        cmd: /sbin/ifconfig
      register: ifconfig_out
    - name: Check IPv4/IPv6 addresses
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - "'10.0.0.1' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
          - "'10.100.0.1' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
          - "'10.100.1.1' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
          - "'fd0b:0:1::1 prefixlen 64' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
          - "'fd0b:100:1::1 prefixlen 64' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
          - "'fd0b:101:1::1 prefixlen 64' in ifconfig_out.stdout"
    - name: Verify services
      ansible.builtin.service:
        name: "{{ item }}"
        state: started
      become: true
      loop:
        - pf
        - pflog
        - dhcp6c

46655.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Test if gotify server file exists
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /opt/gotify/gotify-linux-amd64
      register: file_stat_bin
      failed_when: not file_stat_bin.stat.exists
    - name: Test if systemd startup file exists
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /etc/systemd/system/gotify.service
      register: file_stat_systemd
      failed_when: not file_stat_systemd.stat.exists
    - name: Test if gotify config file exists
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /opt/gotify/config.yml
      register: file_stat_config
      failed_when: not file_stat_config.stat.exists

46657.oscript:

  remote_user: root
  tasks:
    - name: Print current user
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        msg: Current user id {{ ansible_user }}
    - name: Get user state
      ansible.builtin.user:
        name: pi
        state: absent
      register: deleted_user_data
    - name: Check if user is absent
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - deleted_user_data.state == "absent"

46661.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  vars:
    ansible_python_interpreter: "{{ (inventory_hostname in groups.molecule_hosts_centos_7)\n\
      \   | ternary(\"/usr/bin/python\", \"/usr/bin/python3\") }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Search Check_MK agent local dir
      ansible.builtin.shell: set -o pipefail ; /usr/bin/check_mk_agent | grep '[L]ocalDirectory'
        | awk {'print $2'}
      args:
        warn: false
      changed_when: false
      register: search_local_dir_result
    - name: Test jstat check
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ search_local_dir_result.stdout_lines[0]\n   + \"\
        /\"\n   + check_mk_agent_jstat_seconds | string\n   + \"/\"\n   + check_mk_agent_jstat_file\
        \ }}"
      changed_when: false
      register: check_result
    - name: Assert check output is ok
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that: check_result.stdout_lines | length == 0

46663.oscript:
- name: Verify

  gather_facts: false

46666.oscript:

46667.oscript:

        name: snmpd

46679.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Include role default variables
      ansible.builtin.include_vars:
        file: ../../defaults/main.yml
    - name: Check that alias can be used
      ansible.builtin.shell: "# Alias\nshopt -s expand_aliases\nalias {{ git_dotfiles_alias\
        \ }}='git --git-dir={{ git_dotfiles_dir_dot_git }} --work-tree={{ git_dotfiles_dir\
        \ }}'\n\n{{ git_dotfiles_alias }} status\n"
      args:
        chdir: "{{ git_dotfiles_dir }}"
        executable: /bin/bash
      register: git_dotfiles_alias_exec
    - name: Assert that script executed
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that: git_dotfiles_alias_exec.rc == 0

46681.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Find dhclient
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        dest: /etc/dhcp/dhclient.conf
        regexp: ^supersede domain-name-servers {{ networking_domain_name_server }};$
        state: absent
      become: true
      check_mode: true
      register: dhclient_presence
    - name: Find resolvconf
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        dest: /etc/resolvconf/resolv.conf.d/base
        regexp: ^nameserver {{ networking_domain_name_server }}$
        state: absent
      check_mode: true
      register: resolvconf_presence
    - name: Verifiction
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - dhclient_presence.found == 1
          - resolvconf_presence.found == 1

46684.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Collect host package information
      ansible.builtin.package_facts:
        manager: auto
    - name: Package chrony should be installed
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: chrony
        state: present
      check_mode: true
      register: install
      failed_when: (install is changed) or (install is failed)
    - name: File /etc/chrony/chrony.conf should exist with correct permissions
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /etc/chrony/chrony.conf
        state: file
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: "0644"
      check_mode: true
      register: config
      failed_when: (config is changed) or (config is failed)

46690.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Get list of installed packages

        manager: auto
    - name: Set default sensor name
      ansible.builtin.set_fact:
        installed_sensor: falcon-sensor
    - name: Verify Falcon Sensor is installed
      ansible.builtin.assert:

46692.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tags:
    - nria_configure
  tasks:
    - name: Put newrelic-infra.yml fixture
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        src: ./fixtures/newrelic-infra-expected.yml
        dest: /tmp/newrelic-infra-expected.yml
        force: true
    - name: Diff newrelic-infra.yml and fixture
      ansible.builtin.command: diff /tmp/newrelic-infra-expected.yml /etc/newrelic-infra.yml
      register: result
      ignore_errors: true
    - name: Assert newrelic-infra.yml matches fixture
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that: result.failed != true

46694.oscript:
- name: verify
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Unmount old mounts (failures ignored)
      ansible.builtin.command: umount "{{ item.path }}"
      args:
        warn: false
      failed_when: false
      loop: "{{ lin_rclone_mounts }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"
    - name: Mount rclone dirs
      ansible.builtin.command: mount "{{ item.path }}"
      args:
        warn: false
      loop: "{{ lin_rclone_mounts }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"
    - name: Verify mount correctness
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item.path }}/bash"
        state: file
      loop: "{{ lin_rclone_mounts }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"

46699.oscript:
- name: Verify

  tasks:

      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: tftp
        state: present

    - name: Get test file using tftp client

        }}

46708.oscript:

      register: julia_exec_version
      changed_when: false

46751.oscript:
- name: verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Perform ssh login into termux and list home files
      ansible.builtin.command:
        cmd: "ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -oUserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null\n    -p{{\
          \ ansible_port }} -i{{ ssh_key }} termux@localhost\n    ls -lAR\n"
      delegate_to: localhost
      vars:
        ssh_key: "{{ termux_ssh_keys_accept[0] }}"
      register: result
    - name: Assert that required files are present
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - output is search('autostart')
          - output is search('termux.core')
          - output is search('.tmux.conf')
          - output is search('authorized_keys')
      vars:
        output: "{{ result.stdout |d('') }}"
    - name: Report success
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        msg: TEST PASSED.

46757.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Pause to wait for ntp synchronization
      ansible.builtin.pause:
        minutes: 1
    - name: Check if ntp is running an synchronized
      ansible.builtin.command: ntpstat
      register: ntp_check
      changed_when: false
      failed_when: not ntp_check.stdout is search("synchronised to NTP server")
      when: ntp_clock_sync
    - name: Check ntpd is running in slew mode (ntpd -x)
      ansible.builtin.shell: 'set -o pipefail

        ps aux \

        | grep "[n]tpd.* -x$"'
      changed_when: false
      register: ntpd_in_slew_mode_result
      failed_when: ntp_slew_mode and ntpd_in_slew_mode_result.rc != 0 or not ntp_slew_mode
        and ntpd_in_slew_mode_result.rc == 0

46758.oscript:

  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - import_role:
        name: variables
    - name: Get stats on copied file
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /opt/confluent/confluent-{{confluent_package_version}}
      register: archive
    - name: Assert copied file's permissions correct
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - archive.stat.exists
          - archive.stat.gr_name == 'custom'
          - archive.stat.pw_name == 'cp-custom'
        quiet: true

46760.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  vars_files:
    - vars.yml
  roles:
    - role: ansible_role_openwrt
  tasks:
    - name: Check whether dhcp test interface configuration was set
      ansible.builtin.command: uci show dhcp
      register: uci_show_dhcp_result
      failed_when:
        - not "test.interface='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.interface ~
          "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout or not "test.ignore='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.ignore
          ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout or not "test.leasetime='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.leasetime
          ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout or not "test.start='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.start
          ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout or not "test.limit='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.limit
          ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout or not "test.dhcp_option='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.interfaces.test.dhcp_option[0]
          ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_result.stdout
      changed_when: false
    - name: Get dhcp configuration for test host (moon)
      uci:
        command: find
        key: dhcp
        type: host
        find_by:
          name: moon
      register: uci_dhcp_moon_host
    - name: Check whether dhcp host configuration was set
      ansible.builtin.command: uci show dhcp.{{ uci_dhcp_moon_host.section }}
      register: uci_show_dhcp_host_result
      failed_when:
        - not ".name='moon'" in uci_show_dhcp_host_result.stdout or not ".dns='" ~
          openwrt_config_dhcp.hosts.moon.dns ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_host_result.stdout
          or not ".mac='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.hosts.moon.mac ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_host_result.stdout
          or not ".ip='" ~ openwrt_config_dhcp.hosts.moon.ip ~ "'" in uci_show_dhcp_host_result.stdout
      changed_when: false

- name: verify
  hosts: all,!infrastructure_group,!ci-fedora*,!ci-debian*,!ci-ubuntu*

    http_proxy: http://ci-proxy:3128
    https_proxy: http://ci-proxy:3128

      when:
        - ansible_distribution != 'RedHat'
        - ansible_distribution_major_version is version('8', '>=')
      changed_when: false
      args:
        warn: false
        executable: /bin/bash
    - name: Codeready is enabled
      ansible.builtin.shell: "set -o pipefail\nyum repolist|grep ^codeready-builder-for-rhel-{{\
        \ ansible_distribution_major_version }}-{{ ansible_architecture }}-rpms\n"
      when:
        - ansible_distribution == 'RedHat'
        - ansible_distribution_major_version is version('8', '>=')
      changed_when: false
      args:
        warn: false
        executable: /bin/bash
    - name: Test package install
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: epel-rpm-macros.noarch

[{{ ansible_hostname }}]

tasks: - name: Fetch http index ansible.builtin.uri: url: http://localhost return_content: true register: http - name: Fetch https index ansible.builtin.uri: url: https://localhost return_content: true validate_certs: false register: https - name: Verify expected content ansible.builtin.assert: that: - expected_content in http.content - expected_content in https.content fail_msg: The {{ expected_content }} was expected to be found in the returned http/https content

46776.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Execute vector
      ansible.builtin.command: vector --version
      changed_when: false
      register: vector_version_rc
    - name: Check grok pattern is not mangled
      ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
        path: /etc/vector/vector.toml
        line: '    pattern = "(?<capture>\\d+)%{GREEDYDATA}"'
      diff: true
      register: grok_pattern_rc
    - name: Assert vector is installed
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - vector_version_rc is success
          - grok_pattern_rc is not changed

- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Call Linux specific playbook
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: verify_linux.yml
      vars:
        agent_type: "{{ lookup('env', 'AGENT_TYPE') | default('monitoring', True)\
          \ }}"
        package_name: "{{ 'stackdriver-agent' if agent_type=='monitoring' else 'google-fluentd'\
          \ if agent_type == 'logging' else 'google-cloud-ops-agent' }}"
        main_config_file: "{{ lookup('env', 'MAIN_CONFIG_FILE') | default('', True)\
          \ }}"
        additional_config_dir: "{{ '' if agent_type == 'ops-agent' else lookup('env',\
          \ 'ADDITIONAL_CONFIG_DIR') | default('', True) }}"
      when: ansible_os_family in ['Debian', 'RedHat', 'Suse']
    - name: Call Windows specific playbook
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: verify_windows.yml
      vars:
        agent_type: "{{ lookup('env', 'AGENT_TYPE') | default('monitoring', True)\
          \ }}"
        main_config_file: "{{ lookup('env', 'MAIN_CONFIG_FILE') | default('', True)\
          \ }}"
        additional_config_dir: "{{ '' if agent_type == 'ops-agent' else lookup('env',\
          \ 'ADDITIONAL_CONFIG_DIR') | default('', True) }}"
      when: ansible_os_family == 'Windows'

46799.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  vars:
    expected:
      - name: test1
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.1
        ttl: 3600
      - name: test2
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.2
        ttl: 3600
      - name: test3
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.13
        ttl: 3600
      - name: 13
        type: PTR
        value: test3.test.ansible.local.
        ttl: 3600
        zone: 3.2.1.in-addr.arpa
      - name: test6
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.6
        ttl: 3600
      - name: test7
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.7
        ttl: 3600
      - name: test4
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.4
        ttl: 3600
        state: absent
      - name: test5
        type: A
        value: 1.2.3.5
        ttl: 3600
        state: absent
  tasks:
    - name: Win ping
      ansible.windows.win_ping: null
    - name: Verify records
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: includes/verify_record.yml
      vars:
        zone: "{{ record.zone | default(win_dns_record_zone) }}"
        name: "{{ record.name }}"
        type: "{{ record.type }}"
        value: "{{ record.value }}"
        ttl: "{{ record.ttl }}"
        state: "{{ record.state | default('present') }}"
      loop: "{{ expected }}"
      loop_control:
        loop_var: record
        label: "{{ state }} [{{ zone }}] {{ record.name }} {{ record.ttl }} IN {{\
          \ record.type }} {{ record.value }}"

46812.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Check files
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: "{{ files_prefix }}/{{ item }}"
      loop: "{{ (files + files_extra) | map(attribute='path') | list }}"
      register: check_result
    - name: Check file contents
      ansible.builtin.command: cat /tmp/testfile
      changed_when: false
      register: check_content
    - name: Check files are correct
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - item.stat.exists
          - check_content.stdout == "Hello World"
        quiet: true
      loop: "{{ check_result.results }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.stat.path }}"

46849.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: true
  vars:
    expected_slaves: "{{ _verify_expected_slaves }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Verify | check if master is correctly set
      ansible.builtin.command: redis-cli -a {{ redis_password }} INFO REPLICATION
      register: rout
      changed_when: false
      failed_when: rout.rc != 0 or not rout.stdout or rout.stdout.find('role:' + redis_role)
        == -1
    - name: Verify | check number of connected nodes
      ansible.builtin.command: redis-cli -a {{ redis_password }} INFO REPLICATION
      register: rout
      changed_when: false
      failed_when: rout.rc != 0 or rout.stdout.find('connected_slaves:' + expected_slaves|string)
        == -1
      when: redis_role == 'master'
    - name: Verify | check cron is deployed
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: /etc/cron.d/redis_backups_cron
      register: cron_stat
      changed_when: false
      failed_when: not cron_stat.stat.exists
      when: redis_role == 'master'

46889.oscript:
- name: Verify
  hosts: all
  order: sorted
  gather_facts: true
  tasks:
    - name: Define vrrp nic
      ansible.builtin.set_fact:
        vrrp_nic: "{{ ((ansible_interfaces | reject('equalto','lo')) | difference([ansible_default_ipv4.interface]))[0]\
          \ | string }}"
    - name: Show ansible facts
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        var: ansible_facts
        verbosity: 3
    - name: Ensure the first node is master
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - "'ipv4_secondaries' in ansible_{{ vrrp_nic }}"

      when: inventory_hostname == ansible_play_hosts[0]

47599.oscript:
- name: Run tests
  ansible.builtin.include_role:
    name: callback
  vars:
    tests:
      - name: Basic run
        environment:
          ANSIBLE_NOCOLOR: "true"
          ANSIBLE_FORCE_COLOR: "false"
          ANSIBLE_STDOUT_CALLBACK: community.general.yaml
        playbook: "- hosts: testhost\n  gather_facts: false\n  tasks:\n    - name:\
          \ Sample task name\n      debug:\n        msg: sample debug msg\n"
        expected_output:
          - ""
          - PLAY [testhost] ****************************************************************
          - ""
          - TASK [Sample task name] ********************************************************
          - "ok: [testhost] => "
          - "  msg: sample debug msg"
          - ""
          - PLAY RECAP *********************************************************************
          - "testhost                   : ok=1    changed=0    unreachable=0    failed=0\
            \    skipped=0    rescued=0    ignored=0   "
      - name: Test umlauts in multiline
        environment:
          ANSIBLE_NOCOLOR: "true"
          ANSIBLE_FORCE_COLOR: "false"
          ANSIBLE_STDOUT_CALLBACK: community.general.yaml
        playbook: "- hosts: testhost\n  gather_facts: false\n  tasks:\n    - name:\
          \ Umlaut output\n      debug:\n        msg: \"äöü\\néêè\\nßï☺\"\n"
        expected_output:
          - ""
          - PLAY [testhost] ****************************************************************
          - ""
          - TASK [Umlaut output] ***********************************************************
          - "ok: [testhost] => "
          - "  msg: |-"
          - "    äöü"
          - "    éêè"
          - "    ßï☺"
          - ""
          - PLAY RECAP *********************************************************************
          - "testhost                   : ok=1    changed=0    unreachable=0    failed=0\
            \    skipped=0    rescued=0    ignored=0   "

50015.oscript:
- name: Check exists token AccessorID
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: "{{ consul_public_http_prot }}://{{ consul_join_servers[0] }}:{{ consul_public_http_port\
      \ }}/v1/acl/tokens"
    method: GET
    timeout: "10"
    validate_certs: "no"
    headers:
      X-Consul-Token: "{{ consul_acl_arg.master_token }}"
      X-Requested-By: "{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address }}"
      cache-control: no-cache
  environment:
    no_proxy: "{{ consul_join_servers[0] }}"
  register: check_consul_token_accessorid
  until: check_consul_token_accessorid.status == 200
  retries: 5
  delay: 2
  no_log: true

50016.oscript:
- name: Check exists token AccessorID
  ansible.windows.win_uri:
    url: "{{ consul_public_http_prot }}://{{ consul_join_servers[0] }}:{{ consul_public_http_port\
      \ }}/v1/acl/tokens"
    method: GET
    timeout: "10"
    validate_certs: "no"
    return_content: "yes"
    headers:
      X-Consul-Token: "{{ consul_acl_arg.master_token }}"
      X-Requested-By: "{{ ansible_ip_addresses[0] }}"
      cache-control: no-cache
  environment:
    no_proxy: "{{ consul_join_servers[0] }}"
  no_log: true
  register: check_consul_token_accessorid
  until: check_consul_token_accessorid.status_code == 200
  retries: 5
  delay: 2

      \ ) }}"
    notification_type: "{{ tower_notifications_item.notification_type }}"
    notification_configuration: "{{ tower_notifications_item.notification_configuration\
      \ }}"
    messages: "{{ tower_notifications_item.messages | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ tower_notifications_item.username | default(omit) }}"
    sender: "{{ tower_notifications_item.sender| default(omit) }}"
    recipients: "{{ tower_notifications_item.recipients | default(omit) }}"
    use_tls: "{{ tower_notifications_item.use_tls | default('false')   }}"
    host: "{{ tower_notifications_item.host | default(omit) }}"
    use_ssl: "{{ tower_notifications_item.use_ssl | default('false') }}"
    password: "{{ tower_notifications_item.password | default(omit) }}"
    port: "{{ tower_notifications_item.port | default(omit) }}"
    channels: "{{ tower_notifications_item.channels | default(omit) }}"
    token: "{{ tower_notifications_item.token | default(omit) }}"
    account_token: "{{ tower_notifications_item.account_token | default(omit) }}"
    from_number: "{{ tower_notifications_item.from_number | default(omit) }}"
    to_numbers: "{{ tower_notifications_item.to_numbers | default(omit) }}"
    account_sid: "{{ tower_notifications_item.account_sid | default(omit) }}"
    subdomain: "{{ tower_notifications_item.subdomain | default(omit) }}"
    service_key: "{{ tower_notifications_item.service_key | default(omit) }}"
    client_name: "{{ tower_notifications_item.client_name | default(omit) }}"
    message_from: "{{ tower_notifications_item.message_from | default(omit) }}"
    color: "{{ tower_notifications_item.color | default(omit) }}"
    notify: "{{ tower_notifications_item.notify | default(omit) }}"
    url: "{{ tower_notifications_item.url | default(omit) }}"
    headers: "{{ tower_notifications_item.headers | default(omit) }}"
    server: "{{ tower_notifications_item.server| default(omit) }}"
    nickname: "{{ tower_notifications_item.nickname | default(omit) }}"
    targets: "{{ tower_notifications_item.targets | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ tower_notifications_item.state | default(tower_state | default('present'))\
      \ }}"

    tower_username: "{{ tower_username | default('admin') }}"

    loop_var: tower_notifications_item

  when: tower_notifications is defined

name set access control policy setacc.prompt: name set access control policy   setaccesscontrolpolicyname

56500.oscript:
- name: Set Access Control Policy - {{ set_access_control_policy_name }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.access_control.policies.set_file
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ set_access_control_policy_name }}"
      policy_file: "{{ set_access_control_policy_policy_file }}"
      description: "{{ set_access_control_policy_description }}"
      attributesrequired: "{{ set_access_control_policy_attributesrequired }}"
      dialect: "{{ set_access_control_policy_dialect }}"
      predefined: "{{ set_access_control_policy_predefined }}"
      new_name: "{{ set_access_control_policy_new_name }}"
  when:
    - set_access_control_policy_name is defined
    - set_access_control_policy_policy_file is defined
    - set_access_control_policy_attributesrequired is defined
  notify: Commit Changes

  junipernetworks.junos.junos_command:
    commands: "{{ rntebr_command }}"
    display: "{{ junos_command.display | d('xml') }}"
    interval: "{{ junos_command.interval | d(1) }}"
    match: "{{ junos_command.match | d('all') }}"
    retries: "{{ junos_command.retries | d(10) }}"
    wait_for: "{{ junos_command.wait_for | d([]) }}"
  ignore_errors: "{{ rntebr_ignore_errors | d(false) }}"
  register: rntebr_res

  ansible.builtin.shell: "source {{ sdkman_init_sdkman_dir }}/bin/sdkman-init.sh ||\
    \ exit 1\ncurrent_version=''\ncurrent_version=\"$(sdk current {{ item.key | quote\
    \ }} | \\\n  grep --color=never 'Using .* version ' | \\\n  grep --color=never\
    \ --only-matching --perl-regexp '(?<=version )[[:graph:]]+')\"\necho \"Current\
    \ version: $current_version\"\nif [[ \"$current_version\" == {{ item.value | quote\
    \ }} ]]; then\n  echo 'Version is already the default'\nelse\n  sdk default {{\
    \ item.key | quote }} {{ item.value | quote }}\nfi\n"
  become: true
  become_user: "{{ user.username }}"
  args:
    executable: "{{ sdkman_init_shell }}"
  register: sdk_default
  changed_when: "'version set to' in sdk_default.stdout"
  failed_when: sdk_default.rc != 0 or 'Stop!' in sdk_default.stdout
  with_dict: "{{ user.sdkman_default }}"
  loop_control:
    label: "{{ user.username }}"

58991.oscript:
- name: Wait for Jenkins to start up before proceeding.
  ansible.builtin.shell: curl -D - --silent --max-time 5 http://{{ jenkins_hostname
    }}:{{ jenkins_http_port }}{{ jenkins_url_prefix }}/cli/
  register: result
  until: (result.stdout.find("403 Forbidden") != -1) or (result.stdout.find("200 OK")
    != -1) and (result.stdout.find("Please wait while") == -1)
  retries: "{{ jenkins_connection_retries }}"
  delay: "{{ jenkins_connection_delay }}"
  changed_when: false
  check_mode: false

58992.oscript:
- name: Wait for Jenkins to start up before proceeding.
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: http://{{ jenkins_hostname }}:{{ jenkins_http_port }}{{ jenkins_url_prefix
      }}/cli/
    method: GET
    return_content: "yes"
    timeout: 5
    body_format: raw
    follow_redirects: "no"
    status_code: 200,403
  register: result
  until: (result.status == 403 or result.status == 200) and (result.content.find("Please
    wait while") == -1)
  retries: "{{ jenkins_connection_retries }}"
  delay: "{{ jenkins_connection_delay }}"
  changed_when: false
  check_mode: false

58998.oscript:
- name: Wait for Jenkins to start up before proceeding.
  ansible.builtin.command: curl -D - --silent --max-time 5 http://{{ jenkins_hostname
    }}:{{ jenkins_http_port }}{{ jenkins_url_prefix }}/cli/
  args:
    warn: false
  register: result
  until: (result.stdout.find("403 Forbidden") != -1) or (result.stdout.find("200 OK")
    != -1) and (result.stdout.find("Please wait while") == -1)
  retries: "{{ jenkins_connection_retries }}"
  delay: "{{ jenkins_connection_delay }}"
  changed_when: false
  check_mode: false

    if filename != ''NULL'' else ''filename is not define'' }}'
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    dest: "{{ filename }}"
    regexp: "{{ regexp_word }}"
    line: "{{ replace_word }}"
    backup: "{{ 'yes' if is_backup else 'no' }}"
  become: "{{ is_sudo|default('yes')}}"
  when:
    - filename != "NULL"
    - file_exist_result.stat.exists

    regexp: "{{ regexp_word }}"
    replace: "{{ replace_word }}"
    backup: "{{ 'yes' if is_backup else 'no' }}"
  become: "{{ is_sudo|default('yes')}}"
  when:
    - filename != "NULL"
    - file_exist_result.stat.exists

  vmware.alb.avi_role:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"

    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    allow_unlabelled_access: "{{ item.allow_unlabelled_access | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    filters: "{{ item.filters | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    privileges: "{{ item.privileges | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")

60793.oscript:

  credential_type:
    name: "{{ __controller_credential_type_item.name | mandatory }}"
    description: "{{ __controller_credential_type_item.description | default(omit,\
      \ true) }}"

      \ | regex_replace('[ ]{2,}','') }}"
    inputs: "{{ __controller_credential_type_item.inputs | default(omit, true) }}"
    kind: "{{ __controller_credential_type_item.kind | default('cloud') }}"
    state: "{{ __controller_credential_type_item.state | default(controller_state\
      \ | default('present')) }}"
    controller_username: "{{ controller_username | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_password: "{{ controller_password | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_oauthtoken: "{{ controller_oauthtoken | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_host: "{{ controller_hostname | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_config_file: "{{ controller_config_file | default(omit, true) }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ controller_validate_certs | default(omit) }}"
  loop: "{{ controller_credential_types }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: __controller_credential_type_item
  no_log: "{{ controller_configuration_credential_types_secure_logging }}"

    content: "{{ ansible_user }} ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL"
    dest: /etc/sudoers.d/{{ ansible_user }}_nopasswd
    mode: "0440"

62254.oscript:
- name: Add user to sudoers
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    dest: /etc/sudoers
    insertafter: EOF
    line: "{{ item.username }} {% if item.sudo is defined %}{{ item.sudo.hosts | default('ALL')\
      \ }}=({{ item.sudo.users | default('ALL') }}:{{ item.sudo.groups | default('ALL')\
      \ }}) {{ item.sudo.commands | default('ALL') }}{% else %}ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL{%\
      \ endif %}"
    regexp: ^{{ item.username }} .*
    state: present
  when:
    - item.use_sudo|default('False')|bool == True
  become: true
  with_items: "{{ users }}"
  no_log: true

  vmware.alb.avi_memorybalancerrequest:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    controller_info: "{{ item.controller_info | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    node_uuid: "{{ item.node_uuid | default(omit) }}"
    process_info: "{{ item.process_info | default(omit) }}"
    process_instance: "{{ item.process_instance | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    timestamp: "{{ item.timestamp | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.memorybalancerrequest | default([]) }}"

- name: Install Apache
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    apache_package: apache2
    apache_service: apache2
  handlers:
    - name: restart apache
      service:
        name: "{{ apache_service }}"
        state: restarted
  pre_tasks:
    - name: Override apache vars for Red Hat
      set_fact:
        apache_package: httpd
        apache_service: httpd
      when: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat'
  tasks:
    - name: Ensure Apache is installed
      ansible.builtin.package:
        name: "{{ apache_package }}"
        state: present
    - name: Copy in a web page
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "<html>\n<head><title=Hello World</title></head>\n<body>Hello World!</body>\n\
          </html>\n"
        dest: /var/www/html/index.html
      notify: restart apache
    - name: Ensure apache is running and starts at boot

        name: "{{ apache_service }}"
        state: started
        enabled: true

    cinder " -j ACCEPT

    iptables -I INPUT 5 -p tcp -m multiport --ports 9696 -m comment --comment "openstack
    neutron " -j ACCEPT

    iptables-save > /etc/sysconfig/iptables

    '

name configure reverse proxy stanzas en.prompt: name configure reverse proxy stanzas entries adds

71244.oscript:
- name: Configure Reverse Proxy stanza(s) entries (Adds)
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.configuration.entry.add
    isamapi:
      reverseproxy_id: "{{ add_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id }}"
      stanza_id: "{{ item.stanza_id }}"
      entries: "{{ item.entries }}"
  with_items: "{{ add_reverseproxy_conf_entries }}"
  when: add_reverseproxy_conf_entries is defined and add_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id
    is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Reverse Proxy

71245.oscript:

  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.configuration.entry.add
    isamapi:
      reverseproxy_id: "{{ add_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id }}"
      stanza_id: "{{ item.stanza_id }}"
      entries: "{{ item.entries }}"
  with_items: "{{ add_reverseproxy_conf_entries }}"
  when: add_reverseproxy_conf_entries is defined and add_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id
    is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Reverse Proxy

71717.oscript:

  vmware.alb.avi_cluster:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"

    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"

  when: firewall_rules.stat.exists == false

75468.oscript:
- name: Set an Access Policy - {{ set_access_policy_name }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.access_policy.set
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ set_access_policy_name }}"
      category: "{{ set_access_policy_category }}"
      type: "{{ set_access_policy_type }}"
      file: "{{ set_access_policy_file | default(None) }}"
      content: "{{ set_access_policy_content | default(None) }}"
  when: set_access_policy_name is defined
  notify: Commit Changes

77288.oscript:
- name: Avi WafPolicyPSMGroup | Delete WafPolicyPSMGroup
  avi_wafpolicypsmgroup:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    enable: "{{ item.enable | default(omit) }}"
    hit_action: "{{ item.hit_action | default(omit) }}"
    is_learning_group: "{{ item.is_learning_group | default(omit) }}"
    labels: "{{ item.labels | default(omit) }}"
    locations: "{{ item.locations | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    miss_action: "{{ item.miss_action | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)
    - (not (item.system_default | default(false)))
    - (avi_config_state == "absent" or avi_role_state_mode == "absent")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.wafpolicypsmgroup | default([]) }}"

77823.oscript:
- name: Configure forwarding on keenetic ndm
  restconf_config2:
    path: ""
    content: "{{ lookup('template', 'update_forwarding.json.j2') |to_json }}"
  when: outdated
  vars:
    outdated: "{{ old_fwd != new_fwd }}"
    query_old: '[] |map(&merge(@, `{"index": "INDEX"}`), @)'
    old_fwd: "{{ ndm_fwd_old.response |json_query(query_old) |to_nice_json }}"
    new_fwd: "{{ lookup('template', 'new_forwarding.json.j2') |to_nice_json }}"
    ip2mac: "{{ ndm_hotspots.response | json_query('host[].{key: ip, value: mac}')\
      \ | items2dict }}"
  tags: skip_ansible_lint

80415.oscript:
- name: Network min_buf_large
  ansible.builtin.shell:
    cmd: 'set -o pipefail

      lsdev | grep "Virtual I/O Ethernet Adapter" | awk ''{print $1}'' | xargs -I
      % sh -c ''{ echo %; lsattr -El %; }'' | awk ''/ent/ { if (flag == "0" ) {tmpent=$1;
      flag=1 }} flag && /min_buf_large/ && !/{{ var_min_buf_large }}/ {print tmpent,$1,$2;
      flag=0}''

      '
  register: command_output
  when: ansible_distribution == 'AIX'
  changed_when: false
  tags: min_buf_large

80416.oscript:
- name: Network min_buf_large
  ansible.builtin.raw:
    ? 'lsdev | grep "Virtual I/O Ethernet Adapter" | awk ''{print $1}'' | xargs -I
      % sh -c ''{ echo %; lsattr -El %; }'' | awk ''/ent/ { if (flag '
    : = "0" ) {tmpent=$1;
    flag: 0}'
  register: command_output
  changed_when: false
  tags: vios_min_buf_large

      \ }}"

82953.oscript:
- name: Configure SSH daemon.
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    dest: /etc/ssh/sshd_config
    regexp: "{{ item.regexp }}"
    line: "{{ item.line }}"
    state: present
  with_items:
    - regexp: ^PermitRootLogin
      line: PermitRootLogin no
    - regexp: ^UseDNS
      line: UseDNS no
    - regexp: ^GSSAPIAuthentication
      line: GSSAPIAuthentication no
    - regexp: ^AddressFamily
      line: AddressFamily inet
  notify: restart sshd
  become: true

  ansible.builtin.command: sed -i '/## beginning of configuration section by vdsm-4.[0-9]\+.[0-9]\+/,/##

    - /etc/libvirt/qemu-sanlock.conf
    - /etc/sysconfig/libvirtd

87052.oscript:

87065.oscript:
- name: Create DB
  ansible.builtin.include_role:
    name: uniqconsulting.mariadb
  vars:
    mariadb_databases:
      - name: "{{ db.name }}"
        state: present
        collation: utf8_general_ci
        encoding: utf8
    mariadb_users_create:
      - name: "{{ db.user }}"
        password: "{{ db.password }}"
        hosts:
          - localhost
        privs:
          - "{{ db.name }}.*:ALL"
        append_privs: false
  with_items: "{{ vhost.databases }}"

87220.oscript:

  tags:
    - always

87231.oscript:

  ansible.builtin.include_tasks: "{{ ansible_os_family }}.yml"
  when: (ossec_disable_public_repos is not defined) or (ossec_disable_public_repos
    != 'yes')

87338.oscript:
- name: ".....checking"
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: "{{ deploy_api_url }}/clusters?name={{ cluster_name }}"
    method: GET
    headers:
      Content-Type: application/json
    body_format: json
    user: "{{ deploy_login }}"
    password: "{{ deploy_pwd }}"
    status_code: 200
    validate_certs: false
  register: cluster_check_response

87339.oscript:
- name: Checking
  ansible.builtin.fail:
    msg: Cannot initialize Docker Swarm cluster
  when: "ansible_play_hosts | length == 1 or groups[docker_swarm_managers_group] |\
    \ length is even\n"
  run_once: true

87478.oscript:
- name: Adding YUM repository
  ansible.builtin.yum_repository:
    name: docker-ce-stable
    description: Docker CE Stable - $basearch
    baseurl: https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/7/$basearch/stable
    enabled: true
    gpgcheck: true
    gpgkey: https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/gpg

87480.oscript:
- name: Adding YUM repository
  ansible.builtin.get_url:
    url: https://bintray.com/sbt/rpm/rpm
    dest: /etc/yum.repos.d/bintray-sbt-rpm.repo
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: 420
  become: "{{ should_become }}"

87591.oscript:
- name: Create volume
  openstack.cloud.volume:
    cloud: "{{ cloud }}"
    state: present
    size: 1
    display_name: ansible_volume
    display_description: Test volume
  register: vol

87593.oscript:
- name: Create Volume
  netapp.ontap.na_ontap_volume:
    state: present
    name: "{{ vol_name }}"
    junction_path: /{{ vol_name }}
    is_infinite: false
    aggregate_name: "{{ aggr_name }}"
    size: "{{ vol_size }}"
    size_unit: "{{ vol_size_unit }}"
    space_guarantee: none
    policy: "{{ export_policy_name }}"
    volume_security_style: unix
    percent_snapshot_space: 60
    vserver: "{{ vserver_name }}"
    wait_for_completion: true
    hostname: "{{ netapp_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ netapp_username }}"
    password: "{{ netapp_password }}"
    https: true
    validate_certs: false

87806.oscript:

  hosts: all
  remote_user: root

        -y python-minimal)

- name: Installing docker and iproute-tc.prompt: name configuring yum repo for k8s

87825.oscript:
- name: Configuring yum repo for k8s
  ansible.builtin.shell: "cat <<EOF | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/kubernetes.repo
\
    [kubernetes]
name=Kubernetes
baseurl=https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/repos/kubernetes-el7-\\
    $basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
repo_gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/doc/yum-key.gpg\
    \ https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/doc/rpm-package-key.gpg
exclude=kubelet\
    \ kubeadm kubectl
EOF
"
  ignore_errors: true
  changed_when: false

87826.oscript:
- name: Configuring Yum repo for k8s
  ansible.builtin.yum_repository:
    description: Yum for k8s
    name: kubernetes
    baseurl: https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/repos/kubernetes-el7-\$basearch
    enabled: true
    gpgcheck: true
    gpgkey: https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/doc/yum-key.gpg https://packages.cloud.google.com/yum/doc/rpm-package-key.gpg
    repo_gpgcheck: true
    exclude:
      - kubelet
      - kubeadm
      - kubectl

  gather_facts: false

  tasks:
    - name: Image upload
      ntnx_foundation_image_upload:
        nutanix_host: 10.xx.xx.xx
        state: present

88295.oscript:
- name: Create File in Management Root {{ create_mgmt_root_file_name }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.management_root.file.create
    isamapi:
      instance_id: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_instance_id }}"
      id: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_id }}"
      name: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_name }}"
      contents: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_contents }}"
  when:
    - create_mgmt_root_file_contents is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_name is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_instance_id is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_id is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes

88296.oscript:

    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"

    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.management_root.file.create
    isamapi:
      instance_id: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_instance_id }}"
      id: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_id }}"
      name: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_name }}"
      contents: "{{ create_mgmt_root_file_contents }}"
  when:
    - create_mgmt_root_file_contents is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_name is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_instance_id is defined
    - create_mgmt_root_file_id is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes

- name: Avi ClusterCloudDetails | Delete ClusterCloudDetails
  vmware.alb.avi_clusterclouddetails:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    azure_info: "{{ item.azure_info | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)
    - (not (item.system_default | default(false)))
    - (avi_config_state == "absent" or avi_role_state_mode == "absent")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.clusterclouddetails | default([]) }}"

- name: Modify the root user password

    login_user: root

    login_port: "{{ item }}"

    LD_LIBRARY_PATH: "{{ mysql_dir }}/my3306/lib:{{ ansible_env.LD_LIBRARY_PATH }}"

91358.oscript:
- name: Test Update
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  vars:
    provision_template: "{{ lookup('template', 'resources/test-template.yml.j2')\n\
      \ | from_yaml }}"
    include_appname: true
  tasks:
    - name: Apply update to Template
      openshift_provision:
        connection: "{{ openshift_connection }}"
        namespace: provision-test
        resource: "{{ provision_template }}"
    - name: Get Template
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ test_oc_cmd }} get --export template test-template\
        \ -n provision-test -o json"
      register: get_template
      changed_when: false
    - name: Verify Update Template
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: "Template not defined as expected\n>>>\n{{ cmp_template | to_yaml }}\n\
          ===\n{{ got_template | to_yaml }}\n<<<\n"
      vars:
        got_template: "{{ get_template.stdout | from_json | combine(ignore_differences,\
          \ recursive=True) }}"
        cmp_template: "{{ provision_template | combine(ignore_differences, recursive=True)\
          \ }}"
      when: cmp_template.metadata != got_template.metadata or cmp_template.labels
        | default({}) != got_template.labels | default({}) or cmp_template.objects
        != got_template.objects or cmp_template.parameters != got_template.parameters

91360.oscript:
- name: Test Update
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  vars:
    provision_replicaset: test-replicaset.yml.j2
    provision_replicaset_def: "{{ lookup('template', 'resources/' ~ provision_replicaset)\
      \ | from_yaml }}"
    replicaset_app_label: rs-test
    replicaset_replicas: 1
  roles:
    - role: openshift-provision
      openshift_clusters:
        - projects:
            - name: provision-test
              resources:
                - "{{ provision_replicaset }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Get ReplicaSet
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ test_oc_cmd }} get replicaset test-replicaset -n\
        \ provision-test -o json"
      register: get_replicaset
      changed_when: false
    - name: Verify ReplicaSet Update
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: "ReplicaSet not defined as expected\n>>>\n{{ cmp_replicaset | to_yaml\
          \ }}\n===\n{{ got_replicaset | to_yaml }}\n<<<\n"
      vars:
        got_replicaset: "{{ get_replicaset.stdout | from_json | combine(ignore_differences,\
          \ recursive=True) }}"
        cmp_replicaset: "{{ provision_replicaset_def | combine(ignore_differences,\
          \ recursive=True) }}"
      when: cmp_replicaset.metadata != got_replicaset.metadata or cmp_replicaset.spec
        != got_replicaset.spec

91362.oscript:
- name: Test Update
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  vars:
    provision_replicationcontroller: test-replicationcontroller.yml.j2
    provision_replicationcontroller_def: "{{ lookup('template', 'resources/' ~ provision_replicationcontroller)\
      \ | from_yaml }}"
    image_pull_policy: IfNotPresent
    readiness_probe_delay: 5
  roles:
    - role: openshift-provision
      openshift_clusters:
        - projects:
            - name: provision-test
              resources:
                - "{{ provision_replicationcontroller }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Get ReplicationController
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ test_oc_cmd }} get replicationcontroller test-replicationcontroller\
        \ -n provision-test -o json"
      register: get_replicationcontroller
      changed_when: false
    - name: Verify ReplicationController Update
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: "ReplicationController not defined as expected\n>>>\n{{ cmp_replicationcontroller\
          \ | to_yaml }}\n===\n{{ got_replicationcontroller | to_yaml }}\n<<<\n"
      vars:
        got_replicationcontroller: "{{ get_replicationcontroller.stdout | from_json\n\
          \ | combine(ignore_differences, recursive=True) }}"
        cmp_replicationcontroller: "{{ provision_replicationcontroller_def\n | combine(ignore_differences,\
          \ recursive=True) }}"
      when: cmp_replicationcontroller.metadata != got_replicationcontroller.metadata
        or cmp_replicationcontroller.spec != got_replicationcontroller.spec
    - name: Cleanup
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ test_oc_cmd }} delete replicationcontroller test-replicationcontroller\
        \ -n provision-test"

- name: Load Signer Certificate from a server/port into Keystore

    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.base.ssl_certificates.signer_certificate.load

      kdb_id: "{{ load_signer_cert_kdb_id }}"

      server: "{{ load_signer_cert_server }}"
      port: "{{ load_signer_cert_port }}"

    load_signer_cert_server is defined and load_signer_cert_port is defined

- name: Set Remote Syslog Forwarder Sources {{ set_rsyslog_forwarder_sources_server
    }}:{{ set_rsyslog_forwarder_sources_port }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.base.remote_syslog.forwarder_sources.set
    isamapi:
      server: "{{ item.server   }}"
      port: "{{ item.port     }}"
      protocol: "{{ item.protocol }}"
      name: "{{ item.name     }}"
      tag: "{{ item.tag      }}"
      facility: "{{ item.facility }}"
      severity: "{{ item.severity }}"
  when: set_rsyslog_forwarder_sources is defined
  with_items: "{{ set_rsyslog_forwarder_sources | default([]) }}"
  notify: Commit Changes

  ansible.builtin.assert:
    that: ansible_os_family == 'RedHat' and ansible_distribution_major_version is
      version_compare('8', '>=')
    msg: '"This role can only be run against RHEL >= 8. {{ ansible_distribution }}
      {{ ansible_distribution_major_version }} is not supported."'
  tags:
    - always

98855.oscript:

  when:

  tags:
    - always

  community.routeros.command:
    commands:
      - /system scheduler add interval=1w name=backup on-event="system backup save
        name=today.backup" policy=ftp,reboot,read,write,policy,test,password,sniff,sensitive,romon
        start-date=jun/11/2018 start-time=00:00:00
      - /user group add name=ftp policy="ftp,read,sensitive,!local,!telnet,!ssh,!reboot,!write,!policy,!test,!winbox,!password,!web,!sniff,!api,!romon,!dude,!tikapp"
      - /user add address={{ backup_src_ip }} group=ftp name=ftp
      - /user set ftp password={{ backup_password }}
  when:
    - backup_script | bool
    - backup_password is defined
    - backup_src_ip is defined

name ping marathon consul to check if i.prompt: name ping marathon consul to check if it is ready

100951.oscript:
- name: Ping marathon consul to check if it is ready
  ansible.builtin.shell: curl --silent -k -u {{marathon_username}}:{{marathon_password}}
    {{marathon_protocol}}://marathon.service.consul:{{marathon_port}}/ping
  register: result_ping
  until: result_ping.stdout.find("pong") != -1
  retries: 20
  delay: 30

100952.oscript:
- name: Ping marathon consul to check if it is ready
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: "{{ marathon_protocol }}://marathon.service.consul:{{ marathon_port }}/ping"
    force_basic_auth: true
    user: "{{ marathon_username }}"
    password: "{{ marathon_password }}"
    validate_certs: false
    method: GET
    return_content: true
  register: result_ping
  until: result_ping.content.find("pong") != -1
  retries: 20
  delay: 30

    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"

    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"

    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"

    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"

      \ }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)
    - (not (item.system_default | default(false)))
    - (avi_config_state == "absent" or avi_role_state_mode == "absent")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.testsedatastorelevel1 | default([]) }}"

114846.oscript:
- name: Disable IPv6 in grub
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    path: /etc/default/grub
    regexp: "{{ ipv6_regexp }}"
    line: "{{ ipv6_replace }}"
    backrefs: true
    create: false
    mode: "0644"
    backup: true
  vars:
    ipv6_quote: (["']?)
    ipv6_before: ((?:(?<!ipv6.disable=)[^"'])*?)\s*
    ipv6_before_simpler: ([^"']*?)\s*
    ipv6_existing: ((?:ipv6.disable=[^\s"']+\s*?)*)
    ipv6_after: ((?:(?<!ipv6.disable=)[^"'])*)
    ipv6_after_simpler: ([^"']*?)
    ipv6_comments: (\s*#.*|)
    ipv6_regexp: ^GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX={{ ipv6_quote + ipv6_before_simpler + ipv6_existing
      + ipv6_after }}\1{{ ipv6_comments }}$
    ipv6_replace: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX=\1\2\4 ipv6.disable=1\1\5
    ipv6_replace_debug: 2)\2 3)\3 4)\4 5)\5 {{ ipv6_replace }}
  notify:
    - grub2-mkconfig

114847.oscript:
- name: Disable IPv6 in grub
  ansible.builtin.replace:
    dest: /etc/default/grub
    regexp: ^GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX="(.*)"
    replace: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX="\1 ipv6.disable=1"
    backup: true
  notify:
    - grub2-mkconfig

    url: "{{ fallback_oracle_security_policy_artifacts[java_major_version|int] }}"
    dest: "{{ download_path }}\\{{ (fallback_oracle_security_policy_artifacts[java_major_version|int]\n\
      \  | urlsplit('path')).split('/')[-1] }}"
    mode: 493
    headers:

  retries: 15
  delay: 5
  until: policy_file_downloaded is succeeded

120947.oscript:
- name: Avi IpAddrGroup | Delete IpAddrGroup
  community.network.network.avi.avi_ipaddrgroup:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    addrs: "{{ item.addrs | default(omit) }}"
    apic_epg_name: "{{ item.apic_epg_name | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    country_codes: "{{ item.country_codes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    ip_ports: "{{ item.ip_ports | default(omit) }}"
    labels: "{{ item.labels | default(omit) }}"
    marathon_app_name: "{{ item.marathon_app_name | default(omit) }}"
    marathon_service_port: "{{ item.marathon_service_port | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    prefixes: "{{ item.prefixes | default(omit) }}"
    ranges: "{{ item.ranges | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)
    - (not (item.system_default | default(false)))
    - (avi_config_state == "absent" or avi_role_state_mode == "absent")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.ipaddrgroup | default([]) }}"

    source_vars: "{{ __controller_source_item.source_vars | default(omit, true) }}"
    enabled_var: "{{ __controller_source_item.enabled_var | default(omit, true) }}"
    enabled_value: "{{ __controller_source_item.enabled_value | default(omit, true)\
      \ }}"

    credential: "{{ __controller_source_item.credential | default(omit, true) }}"
    execution_environment: "{{ __controller_source_item.execution_environment | default(omit,\
      \ true) }}"
    overwrite: "{{ __controller_source_item.overwrite | default(omit) }}"
    overwrite_vars: "{{ __controller_source_item.overwrite_vars | default(omit) }}"
    custom_virtualenv: "{{ __controller_source_item.custom_virtualenv | default(omit,\
      \ true) }}"
    timeout: "{{ __controller_source_item.timeout | default(omit, true) }}"
    verbosity: "{{ __controller_source_item.verbosity | default(omit, true) }}"
    update_on_launch: "{{ __controller_source_item.update_on_launch | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    update_cache_timeout: "{{ __controller_source_item.update_cache_timeout | default(omit,\
      \ true) }}"
    source_project: "{{ __controller_source_item.source_project.name | default( __controller_source_item.source_project\
      \ | default(omit, true)) }}"
    update_on_project_update: "{{ __controller_source_item.update_on_project_update\
      \ | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ __controller_source_item.state | default(controller_state | default('present'))\
      \ }}"
    notification_templates_started: "{{ __controller_source_item.notification_templates_started\
      \ | default(__controller_source_item.related.notification_templates_started\
      \ | default([]) | map(attribute='name') | list ) }}"
    notification_templates_success: "{{ __controller_source_item.notification_templates_success\
      \ | default(__controller_source_item.related.notification_templates_success\
      \ | default([]) | map(attribute='name') | list ) }}"
    notification_templates_error: "{{ __controller_source_item.notification_templates_error\
      \ | default(__controller_source_item.related.notification_templates_error |\
      \ default([]) | map(attribute='name') | list ) }}"
    controller_config_file: "{{ controller_config_file | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_host: "{{ controller_hostname | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_username: "{{ controller_username | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_password: "{{ controller_password | default(omit, true) }}"
    controller_oauthtoken: "{{ controller_oauthtoken | default(omit, true) }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ controller_validate_certs | default(omit) }}"
  loop: "{{ controller_inventory_sources }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: __controller_source_item
  no_log: "{{ controller_configuration_inventory_sources_secure_logging }}"
  async: 1000
  poll: 0
  register: __inventory_source_job_async
  changed_when: not __inventory_source_job_async.changed
  vars:
    ansible_async_dir: /tmp/.ansible_async

123098.oscript:
- name: 3.6.4 - Ensure outbound and established connections are configured
  ansible.builtin.iptables:

    protocol: tcp
    match: state
    ctstate: ESTABLISHED,NEW
    jump: ACCEPT
  become: true
  tags:
    - level-1
    - section-3
    - 3.6.4
    - not-scored

125773.oscript:
- name: Add a new OAuth 2.0 Definition {{ add_oauth_definition_name }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.api_protection.definitions.add
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ add_oauth_definition_name }}"
      description: "{{ add_oauth_definition_description }}"
      grantTypes: "{{ add_oauth_definition_grantTypes }}"
      tcmBehavior: "{{ add_oauth_definition_tcmBehavior }}"
      accessTokenLifetime: "{{ add_oauth_definition_accessTokenLifetime }}"
      accessTokenLength: "{{ add_oauth_definition_accessTokenLength }}"
      enforceSingleUseAuthorizationGrant: "{{ add_oauth_definition_enforceSingleUseAuthorizationGrant\
        \ }}"
      authorizationCodeLifetime: "{{ add_oauth_definition_authorizationCodeLifetime\
        \ }}"
      authorizationCodeLength: "{{ add_oauth_definition_authorizationCodeLength }}"
      issueRefreshToken: "{{ add_oauth_definition_issueRefreshToken }}"
      refreshTokenLength: "{{ add_oauth_definition_refreshTokenLength }}"
      maxAuthorizationGrantLifetime: "{{ add_oauth_definition_maxAuthorizationGrantLifetime\
        \ }}"
      enforceSingleAccessTokenPerGrant: "{{ add_oauth_definition_enforceSingleAccessTokenPerGrant\
        \ }}"
      enableMultipleRefreshTokensForFaultTolerance: "{{ add_oauth_definition_enableMultipleRefreshTokensForFaultTolerance\
        \ }}"
      pinPolicyEnabled: "{{ add_oauth_definition_pinPolicyEnabled }}"
      pinLength: "{{ add_oauth_definition_pinLength }}"
      tokenCharSet: "{{ add_oauth_definition_tokenCharSet }}"
      oidc: "{{ add_oauth_definition_oidc }}"
  when: add_oauth_definition_name is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes

    definition:
      kind: Deployment
      apiVersion: apps/v1
      metadata:
        name: "{{ ansible_operator_meta.name }}-memcached"
        namespace: "{{ ansible_operator_meta.namespace }}"
      spec:
        replicas: "{{size}}"
        selector:
          matchLabels:
            app: memcached
        template:
          metadata:
            labels:
              app: memcached
          spec:
            containers:
              - name: memcached
                command:
                  - memcached
                  - -m=64
                  - -o
                  - modern
                  - -v
                image: memcached:1.4.36-alpine
                ports:
                  - containerPort: 11211

      lsdev | grep "Virtual I/O Ethernet Adapter" | awk ''{print $1}'' | xargs -I
      % sh -c ''{ echo %; lsattr -El %; }'' | awk ''/ent/ { if (flag == "0" ) {tmpent=$1;
      flag=1 }} flag && /max_buf_huge/ && !/{{ var_max_buf_huge }}/ {print tmpent,$1,$2;
      flag=0}''

      '
  register: command_output
  when: ansible_distribution == 'AIX'
  changed_when: false
  tags: max_buf_huge

  community.general.lxd_container:
    name: "{{ item.name }}"
    state: "{{ item.state | default(omit) }}"
    source:
      type: '{{ item.type | default("image") }}'
      mode: '{{item.mode | default("pull") }}'
      server: '{{ item.server | default("https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/releases")
        }}'
      protocol: '{{ item.protocal | default("simplestreams") }}'
      alias: "{{ item.alias }}"
    profiles: "{{ item.profiles | default(omit) }}"

  become_method: "{{ item.become_method | default(omit) }}"
  become_flags: "{{ item.become_flags | default(omit) }}"
  become_user: "{{ item.become_user | default(omit) }}"
  with_items: "{{ lxd_containers }}"
  register: lxd_container_status
  changed_when: item.state|default('started') != lxd_container_status.old_state

133664.oscript:
- name: Configure repos for custom products
  redhat.satellite.repository:
    username: "{{ satellite.admin_username }}"
    password: "{{ satellite.admin_password }}"
    validate_certs: false
    server_url: "{{ satellite_url }}"
    organization: "{{ organization.organization_name }}"
    state: present
    content_type: yum
    name: "{{ repo.1.repo }}"
    product: "{{ repo.1.product }}"
    url: "{{ repo.1.repo_url }}"
    mirror_on_sync: false
    download_policy: immediate
    gpg_key: "{{ repo.1.content_credential_name }}"
  when:
    - repo.1.repo is defined
    - repo.1.product is defined
    - repo.1.repo_url is defined
    - repo.1.content_credential is defined
  loop_control:
    loop_var: repo
  loop: "{{ organization.content_views | subelements('repos') }}"
  delegate_to: "{{ delegate_host }}"

133665.oscript:

  theforeman.foreman.repository:
    username: "{{ satellite.admin_username }}"
    password: "{{ satellite.admin_password }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ repo.1.validate_certs | default(false) }}"
    server_url: "{{ satellite_url }}"
    organization: "{{ organization.organization_name }}"
    state: "{{ repo.1.state | default('present') }}"
    content_type: "{{ repo.1.content_type | default('yum') }}"
    name: "{{ repo.1.repo }}"
    product: "{{ repo.1.product }}"
    url: "{{ repo.1.repo_url }}"
    mirror_on_sync: "{{ repo.1.mirror_on_sync | default(false) }}"
    download_policy: "{{ repo.1.download_policy | default('immediate') }}"
    gpg_key: "{{ repo.1.content_credential_name | default(omit) }}"
    checksum_type: "{{ repo.1.checksum_type | default(omit) }}"
    unprotected: "{{ repo.1.unprotected | default(omit) }}"
    upstream_username: "{{ repo.1.upstream_username | default(omit) }}"
    upstream_password: "{{ repo.1.upstream_password | default(omit) }}"
  when:
    - repo.1.repo is defined
    - repo.1.product is defined
    - repo.1.repo_url is defined
    - repo.1.custom_repo is defined
  loop_control:
    loop_var: repo
  loop: "{{ organization.content_views | subelements('repos') }}"
  delegate_to: "{{ delegate_host }}"

name cleaning up challenge dns entries.prompt:
name cleaning up challenge dns entries for   joinacmecertificatedomains
     acmecertificateips  via route53

135920.oscript:
- name: Cleaning up challenge DNS entries for {{ ', '.join(acme_certificate_domains
    + acme_certificate_ips) }} via Route53
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: http://{{ acme_host }}:5000/dns/{{ item.key }}
    method: DELETE
  delegate_to: localhost
  run_once: true
  with_dict: "{{ acme_certificate_INTERNAL_challenge.challenge_data_dns | default({})\
    \ }}"

135921.oscript:
- name: Cleaning up challenge DNS entries for {{ ', '.join(acme_certificate_domains
    + acme_certificate_ips) }} via Route53
  community.aws.route53:
    state: absent
    zone: "{{ item.key | community.dns.get_registrable_domain }}"
    record: "{{ item.key }}"
    type: TXT
    ttl: 60
    value: '{{ item.value | map(''regex_replace'', ''^(.*)$'', ''"\1"'' ) | list }}'
    overwrite: true
    aws_access_key: "{{ acme_certificate_aws_access_key }}"
    aws_secret_key: "{{ acme_certificate_aws_secret_key }}"
  delegate_to: localhost
  run_once: true
  with_dict: "{{ acme_certificate_INTERNAL_challenge.challenge_data_dns | default({})\
    \ }}"

- name: Set a Mapping Rule - {{ set_mapping_rule_name }}
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.mapping_rules.set

      name: "{{ set_mapping_rule_name }}"
      category: "{{ set_mapping_rule_category }}"
      filename: "{{ set_mapping_rule_filename | default(None) }}"
      content: "{{ set_mapping_rule_content | default(None) }}"

  when: set_mapping_rule_name is defined and set_mapping_rule_category is defined
  notify: Commit Changes

    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"

    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.mapping_rules.set
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ set_mapping_rule_name }}"
      category: "{{ set_mapping_rule_category }}"
      filename: "{{ set_mapping_rule_filename | default(None) }}"
      content: "{{ set_mapping_rule_content | default(None) }}"

136752.oscript:
- name: Create test files
  ansible.windows.win_shell: "$folders = @(
    "folder",
    "folder\folder1"\
    ,
    "folder\folder2",
    "folder with space",
    "folder with space\\
    folder1",
    "folder with space\folder2"
)
$tmp_dir = '{{ test_win_owner_path\
    \ }}'
if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $tmp_dir) {
    Remove-Item -LiteralPath $tmp_dir\
    \ -Force -Recurse
}
New-Item -Path $tmp_dir -ItemType Directory

foreach ($folder\
    \ in $folders) {
    New-Item -Path "$tmp_dir\$folder" -ItemType Directory
\
    }
$files = @(
    "folder\file.txt",
    "folder\folder1\file.txt",
\
    \    "folder\folder2\file.txt",
    "folder with space\file.txt",
  \
    \  "folder with space\folder1\file.txt",
    "folder with space\folder2\\
    file.txt"
)
foreach ($file in $files) {
    Set-Content -LiteralPath "$tmp_dir\\
    $file" -Value "content"
}
"

148794.oscript:
- name: Create the Workfow Node
  tower_workflow_job_template_node:
    identifier: "{{ workflow_loop_node.identifier }}"
    extra_data: "{{ workflow_loop_node.extra_data | default (omit) }}"
    inventory: "{{ workflow_loop_node.inventory | default (omit) }}"
    scm_branch: "{{ workflow_loop_node.scm_branch | default (omit) }}"
    job_type: "{{ workflow_loop_node.job_type | default (omit) }}"
    job_tags: "{{ workflow_loop_node.job_tags | default (omit) }}"
    skip_tags: "{{ workflow_loop_node.skip_tags | default (omit) }}"
    limit: "{{ workflow_loop_node.limit | default (omit) }}"
    diff_mode: "{{ workflow_loop_node.diff_mode | default (false) }}"
    verbosity: "{{ workflow_loop_node.verbosity | default (omit) }}"
    credentials: "{{ workflow_loop_node.credentials | default(workflow_loop_node.related.credentials\
      \ | default([]) | map(attribute='name') | list ) }}"
    workflow_job_template: "{{ workflow_loop_node.workflow_job_template.name | default(\
      \ workflow_loop_node.workflow_job_template | default (omit) ) }}"
    unified_job_template: "{{ workflow_loop_node.unified_job_template.name | default(\
      \ workflow_loop_node.unified_job_template | default (omit)) }}"
    approval_node: "{{ workflow_loop_node.approval_node | default (omit) }}"
    workflow: "{{ workflow_loop_var.name }}"
    state: "{{ workflow_loop_node.state | default(tower_state | default('present'))\
      \ }}"
    all_parents_must_converge: "{{ workflow_loop_node.all_parents_must_converge |\
      \ default (omit) }}"
    organization: "{{ workflow_loop_var.organization.name | default( workflow_loop_var.organization\
      \ ) }}"
    tower_username: "{{ tower_username | default(omit) }}"
    tower_password: "{{ tower_password | default(omit) }}"
    tower_oauthtoken: "{{ tower_oauthtoken | default(omit) }}"
    tower_host: "{{ tower_hostname }}"
    tower_config_file: "{{ tower_config_file | default(omit) }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ tower_validate_certs | default('true') }}"
  loop: "{{ workflow_loop_var.related.workflow_nodes | default( workflow_loop_var.workflow_nodes\
    \ ) }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: workflow_loop_node
  when:
    - workflow_loop_var.related.workflow_nodes is defined or workflow_loop_var.workflow_nodes
      is defined
    - workflow_loop_node is iterable
  no_log: "{{ workflow_job_templates_secure_logging }}"

149807.oscript:
- name: Set runtime components
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.runtime.configuration.entry.{{ item.method }}
    isamapi: "{{ item | ibm.isam.exclude('method') }}"
  with_items: "{{ policyserver_runtime.entries if (policyserver_runtime.entries is\
    \ defined and (policyserver_runtime.entries != None)) else [] }}"
  when: "item.method is defined and item.resource_id == resource_id and item.stanza_id\
    \ == stanza_id and (\n  (item.entries is defined and (item.entries | ibm.isam.include_only(entry_id))\
    \ != [] ) or\n  (item.entry_id is defined)\n)\n"
  loop_control:
    label: "( method: [{{ item.method }}], resource_id: [{{ item.resource_id }}],\
      \ stanza_id: [{{ item.stanza_id }}], entries: [{{ item.entries if item.entries\
      \ is defined else 'None'}}], entry_id: [{{ item.entry_id if item.entry_id is\
      \ defined else 'None'}}], value_id: [{{ item.value_id if item.value_id is defined\
      \ else 'None'}}])"
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Web Runtime
