152078.oscript:
- name: Manage databases
  community.general.influxdb_database:
    database_name: "{{ db.name }}"
    login_username: "{{ db.login_username | default(influxdb_admin_username) }}"
    login_password: "{{ db.login_password | default(influxdb_admin_password) }}"
    hostname: "{{ db.hostname | default(influxdb_config_http['bind-address'].split(':')[0])\
      \ }}"
    port: "{{ db.port | default(influxdb_config_http['bind-address'].split(':')[1])\
      \ }}"
    proxies: "{{ db.proxies | default(omit) }}"
    retries: "{{ db.retries | default(omit) }}"
    ssl: "{{ db.ssl | default(influxdb_config_http['https-enabled']) }}"
    state: "{{ db.state }}"
    timeout: "{{ db.timeout | default(omit) }}"
    udp_port: "{{ db.udp_port | default('4444') }}"
    use_udp: "{{ db.use_udp | default('no') }}"
    validate_certs: "{{ db.validate_certs | default('false') }}"
  loop: "{{ influxdb_databases }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: db
  when: influxdb_databases is defined

152079.oscript:
- name: Manage databases
  ansible.builtin.script: manage_influx_database.sh {{ item }}
  become: true
  become_user: "{{ influxdb_install_user }}"
  register: manage_influx_database_result
  changed_when: manage_influx_database_result.rc == 10
  failed_when: manage_influx_database_result.rc != 0 and manage_influx_database_result.rc
    != 10
  with_items: "{{ influxdb_databases }}"

152083.oscript:

  loop: "{{ mariadb_databases }}"

152192.oscript:

    backrefs: true
    dest: "{{ pgsqlrep_data_path[pgsql_major_version] }}/postgresql.conf"
    regexp: "{{ item.regexp }}"
    line: "{{ item.line }}"
  loop: "{{ pgsqlrep_postgres_conf_lines }}"
  notify: restart postgresql

name copy dotfiles to target host user.prompt: name copy dotfiles to target host user account

156409.oscript:
- name: Copy dotfiles to target host user account
  ansible.builtin.command: "lxc file push --recursive --create-dirs {{item['homedir_root']|default(users_defaults['homedir_root']\
    \ ~ '/' ~ item.name)}}/{{item.dotfiles_dir}} {{ansible_hostname}}/{{item['homedir_root']|default(users_defaults['homedir_root']\
    \ ~ '/' ~ item.name)}}\n"
  delegate_to: localhost
  loop: "{{users|selectattr('dotfiles_dir','defined')|list}}"
  when:
    - cm_user == a_cm_user
  vars:
    cm_user: "{{users_usermap.get(item['name'], item['name'])}}"

156410.oscript:
- name: Copy dotfiles to target host user account
  ansible.builtin.copy:
    src: "{{item['homedir']|default(users_defaults['homedir_root'] ~ '/' ~ cm_user)}}/{{item['dotfiles_dir']}}"
    dest: "{{item['homedir']|default(users_defaults['homedir_root'] ~ '/' ~ item['name'])}}/"
    owner: "{{item['name']}}"
    group: "{{usergroup['name']}}"
  loop: "{{users|selectattr('dotfiles_dir','defined')|list}}"
  when:
    - cm_user == a_cm_user
  vars:
    cm_user: "{{users_usermap.get(item['name'], item['name'])}}"

name add federation partner addpartne.prompt: name add federation partner   addpartnerpartnername  to  addpartnerfederationname

156698.oscript:
- name: Add Federation Partner - {{ add_partner_partner_name }} to {{ add_partner_federation_name
    }}
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.fed.partners.add
    isamapi:
      federation_name: "{{ add_partner_federation_name }}"
      partner_name: "{{ add_partner_partner_name }}"
      enabled: "{{ add_partner_enabled }}"
      role: ibm.isam.           "{{ add_partner_role }}"
      configuration: "{{ add_partner_configuration }}"
      templateName: "{{ add_partner_templateName }}"
  when:
    - add_partner_federation_name is defined
    - add_partner_partner_name is defined
    - add_partner_enabled is defined
    - add_partner_role is defined
    - add_partner_configuration is defined
    - add_partner_templateName is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Reload Liberty Runtime

      configuration: "{{ add_partner_configuration }}"

    - add_partner_configuration is defined
    - add_partner_templateName is defined

        state: absent
        remove_on_absent:
          - network_interfaces
          - virtual_storage
          - public_ips

      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"

        region: "{{ item.region | default(omit) }}"
        project: "{{ item.project | default(omit) }}"
        instance_id: "{{ item.instance_id | default(omit) }}"
        ignore_ssl: "{{ item.ignore_ssl | default(True) }}"

      register: server

      poll: 0

        \ true) | from_yaml | flatten(levels=1) }}"
      async: 7200
      poll: 0

172197.oscript:

      community.docker.docker_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: absent
        force_kill: true
        keep_volumes: false
      register: server
      loop: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"
      no_log: false
      async: 7200
      poll: 0

172436.oscript:
- name: Create LXC containers
  community.general.proxmox:
    api_host: "{{ proxmox_provision_api_host }}"
    api_user: "{{ proxmox_provision_api_user }}"
    api_password: "{{ proxmox_provision_api_password }}"
    node: "{{ node }}"
    hostname: "{{ item.value.hostname }}"
    state: present
    pubkey: "{{ item.value.key | default(omit) }}"
    validate_certs: false
    ostemplate: "{{ item.value.template }}"
    hookscript: "{{ hookscript | default('local:snippets/ansible_hook.sh') }}"
    netif: "{'net0':'name=eth0,gw={{ item.value.network.gateway }},ip={{ item.value.network.ip\
      \ }}/24,bridge=vmbr0'}"
    cpus: "{{ item.value.cpus }}"
    cores: "{{ item.value.cores }}"
    cpuunits: "{{ item.value.cpuunits | default(omit) }}"
    storage: "{{ item.value.storage | default(local) }}"
    disk: "{{ item.value.disk }}"
    memory: "{{ item.value.memory }}"
    onboot: "{{ item.value.onboot }}"
    swap: "{{ item.value.swap | default(omit) }}"
    vmid: "{{ item.value.vmid }}"
    unprivileged: "{{ item.value.unprivileged | default(omit) }}"
    proxmox_default_behavior: compatibility
  loop: "{{ lookup('dict', proxmox_provision_lxcs, wantlist=True) }}"

      email: "{{ set_oauth_client_email }}"
      phone: "{{ set_oauth_client_phone }}"
      otherInfo: "{{ set_oauth_client_otherInfo }}"

      clientSecret: "{{ set_oauth_client_clientSecret }}"
      requirePkce: "{{ set_oauth_client_requirePkce }}"
      encryptionDb: "{{ set_oauth_client_encryptionDb }}"
      encryptionCert: "{{ set_oauth_client_encryptionCert }}"

- name: Configure DNS server

    command: set

    value:
      rebind_protection: "{{ openwrt_dnsmasq_rebind_protection | default(omit) }}"
      rebind_localhost: "{{ openwrt_dnsmasq_rebind_localhost | default(omit) }}"
      rebind_domain: "{{ openwrt_dnsmasq_rebind_domain | default(omit) }}"
      server: "{{ openwrt_dnsmasq_server | default(omit) }}"

182260.oscript:
- name: Configure paths
  ansible.builtin.lineinfile:
    dest: ~/.profile
    line: "{{ line_item.content }}"
    state: present
    regexp: "{{ line_item.regexp }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: line_item
  with_items:
    - content: export RUBYMOTION_ANDROID_NDK={{ ansible_env['HOME'] }}/.rubymotion-android/ndk
      regexp: ^export RUBYMOTION_ANDROID_NDK=
    - content: export RUBYMOTION_ANDROID_SDK={{ ansible_env['HOME'] }}/.rubymotion-android/sdk
      regexp: ^export RUBYMOTION_ANDROID_SDK=

182262.oscript:
- name: Configure paths
  ansible.builtin.set_fact:
    dir_next_version: "{{ dir_versions }}/{{ project_version }}"
    link_current: "{{ dir_env }}/static"

183257.oscript:
- name: Create Cluster
  community.vmware.vmware_cluster:
    datacenter_name: "{{ dc1 }}"
    cluster_name: "{{ ccr1 }}"

183258.oscript:
- name: Create Cluster
  ansible.builtin.shell: "curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tigera/ccol1/main/control-init.yaml\
    \ | multipass launch -n control -m 2048M 20.04 --cloud-init -\ncurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tigera/ccol1/main/node1-init.yaml\
    \ | multipass launch -n node1 20.04 --cloud-init -\ncurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tigera/ccol1/main/node2-init.yaml\
    \ | multipass launch -n node2 20.04 --cloud-init -\ncurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tigera/ccol1/main/host1-init.yaml\
    \ | multipass launch -n host1 20.04 --cloud-init -\n"

183260.oscript:
- name: Create cluster
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: "{{ rancher_cluster_master_url }}/v3/cluster"
    method: POST
    body:
      type: cluster
      nodes: []
      rancherKubernetesEngineConfig:
        ignoreDockerVersion: true
        network:
          type: networkConfig
          plugin: "{{ item.network_provider | default(rancher_cluster_network_provider_default)\
            \ }}"
      name: "{{ item.name }}"
    status_code: 201
    body_format: json
    headers:
      Authorization: Bearer {{ rancher_api_token }}
    validate_certs: "{{ rancher_cluster_validate_certs }}"
  register: cluster_result

name avi controllerportalregistration.prompt: name avi controllerportalregistration  create or update controllerportalregistration

183393.oscript:
- name: Avi ControllerPortalRegistration | Create or Update ControllerPortalRegistration
  avi_controllerportalregistration:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    asset: "{{ item.asset | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    portal_auth: "{{ item.portal_auth | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (avi_role_state_mode == "present" and avi_config_state == "present")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.controllerportalregistration | default([]) }}"

188070.oscript:
- name: Python is installed
  ansible.builtin.raw:
    ? "if [ $(command -v apt-get) ]; then\n  apt-get update \\\n  && apt-get install\
      \ -y \\\n    python sudo bash ca-certificates systemd-sysv\nelif [ $(command\
      \ -v dnf) ]; then\n  dnf makecache \\\n  && dnf --assumeyes install \\\n   \
      \ python3 python3-pip sudo python3-devel python3-dnf bash python3-libselinux\
      \ \\\n  && dnf clean all\nelif [ $(command -v yum) ]; then\n  yum makecache\
      \ fast \\\n  && yum install -y \\\n    python sudo yum-plugin-ovl bash \\\n\
      \  && sed -i 's/plugins"
    : "0/plugins=1/g' /etc/yum.conf\nfi\n"

195121.oscript:
- name: Create local users
  hosts: all
  vars:
    users:
      - name: user1
        uid: 1001
        key: ssh-rsa 1001
      - name: user2
        uid: 1002
        key: ssh-rsa 1002
      - name: user3
        uid: 1003
        key: ssh-rsa 1003
      - name: user4
        uid: 1004
        key: ssh-rsa 1004
      - name: user5
        uid: 1005
        key: ssh-rsa 1005
  tasks:
    - name: Create users
      ansible.builtin.user:
        append: true
        createhome: true
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: present
        uid: "{{ item.uid }}"
        update_password: on_create
      become: true
      with_items: "{{ users }}"
    - name: Set authorized keys
      ansible.posix.authorized_key:
        key: "{{ item.key }}"
        manage_dir: false
        state: present
        user: "{{ item.name }}"
      become: true
      become_user: "{{ item.name }}"
      with_items: "{{ users }}"

    - vsphere-vars.yml

- name: Install python-consul\n ansible.prompt: name run consul container with bootstrap

203188.oscript:
- name: Run consul container with bootstrap
  community.docker.docker_container:
    name: consul
    image: "{{ consul_image }}"
    state: started
    detach: true
    restart_policy: false
    network_mode: bridge
    published_ports:
      - 8300:8300
      - 8301:8301
      - 8301:8301/udp
      - 8302:8302
      - 8302:8302/udp
      - 8400:8400
      - 8500:8500
      - "{{ docker_bridge_ip }}:8600:53"
      - "{{ docker_bridge_ip }}:8600:53/udp"
    hostname: "{{ ansible_hostname }}"
    volumes:
      - /mnt:/data
    command: -server -advertise "{{consul_advertise}}" -bootstrap-expect "{{consul_bootstrap_expect}}"
      -ui-dir /ui
  when: consul_mode == "server" and consul_bootstrap == "1"

203189.oscript:
- name: Run consul container with bootstrap
  docker:
    name: consul
    image: "{{ consul_image }}"
    state: started
    detach: true
    restart_policy: always
    net: bridge
    ports:
      - 8300:8300
      - 8301:8301
      - 8301:8301/udp
      - 8302:8302
      - 8302:8302/udp
      - 8400:8400
      - 8500:8500
      - "{{ docker_bridge_ip }}:8600:53"
      - "{{ docker_bridge_ip }}:8600:53/udp"
    hostname: "{{ ansible_hostname }}"
    volumes:
      - /mnt:/data
    command: -server -advertise "{{consul_advertise}}" -bootstrap-expect "{{consul_bootstrap_expect}}"
      -ui-dir /ui
  when: consul_mode == "server" and consul_bootstrap == "1"

    - dest: "{{ shell_zshrc }}"

    - dest: "{{ shell_fish }}"

  loop_control:
    label: "{{ item.dest | basename }}"

- name: MEDIUM | RHEL-07-020020 | AUDIT.prompt:
name medium  rhel07020020  audit  the red hat enterprise linux operating system
    must prevent nonprivileged users from executing privileged functions to include
    disabling circumventing or altering implemented security safeguardscountermeasures

212727.oscript:
- name: MEDIUM | RHEL-07-020020 | AUDIT | The Red Hat Enterprise Linux operating system
    must prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions to include
    disabling, circumventing, or altering implemented security safeguards/countermeasures.
  ansible.builtin.shell: "awk -F: '/^{{ rhel_07_020020_selinux_local_interactive_users_group\
    \ }}/ {print $4;}' /etc/group | tr ',' '\n'"
  register: rhel_07_020020_local_interactive_users
  when:
    - rhel_07_020020
    - rhel7stig_disruption_high
    - rhel7stig_audit_disruptive
  tags:
    - RHEL-07-020020

  ansible.builtin.command: "awk -F: '/^{{ rhel_07_020020_selinux_local_interactive_users_group\
    \ }}/ {print $4;}' /etc/group | tr ',' '\n'"
  register: rhel_07_020020_local_interactive_users
  when:
    - rhel_07_020020

215469.oscript:
- name: "{{ item.name }}"
  ansible.builtin.shell: "{{ item.script | d(item.shell | d(item.command)) }}"
  args:
    chdir: "{{ item.chdir      | d(omit) }}"
    creates: "{{ item.creates    | d(omit) }}"
    removes: "{{ item.removes    | d(omit) }}"
    executable: '{{ item.executable | d("bash") }}'
  when: item.name|d() and item.state not in [ 'absent', 'ignore' ]
  no_log: "{{ item.no_log | d(False) }}"

215470.oscript:
- name: "{{ item.name }}"
  community.general.ldap_entry:
    dn: '{{ item.dn if (item.dn is string) else item.dn | join(",") }}'
    objectClass: "{{ item.objectClass | d(omit) }}"
    attributes: "{{ item.attributes | d(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ item.entry_state | d(item.state) }}"
  run_once: "{{ item.run_once | d(False) }}"
  when: (item.objectClass|d() or item.entry_state|d()) and item.state not in [ 'init',
    'ignore' ]
  no_log: '{{ item.no_log | d(True if ("userPassword" in (item.attributes|d({})).keys()
    or "olcRootPW"    in (item.attributes|d({})).keys()) else False) }}'

name clean dns records for challanges.prompt: name clean dns records for challanges

216042.oscript:
- name: Clean dns records for challanges
  community.general.cloudflare_dns:
    zone: "{{ _challenge.value['dns-01'].record.split('.')[-2:]|join('.') }}"
    record: "{{ _challenge.value['dns-01'].record.split('.')[:-2]|join('.') }}"
    type: TXT
    state: absent
    api_token: "{{ ssl.provider.challenge.api_token }}"
  loop: "{{ _ssl_request.challenge_data | dict2items }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: _challenge

216043.oscript:
- name: Clean dns records for challanges
  community.general.nsupdate:
    server: 127.0.0.1
    key_algorithm: hmac-md5
    key_name: ansible
    key_secret: "{{ _dnsseckey_value.stdout }}"
    record: "{{ _challenge.value['dns-01'].record }}."
    type: TXT
    state: absent
  loop: "{{ _ssl_request.challenge_data | dict2items }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: _challenge

217622.oscript:
- name: Configure provisioning templates
  redhat.satellite.provisioning_template:
    username: "{{ satellite.admin_username }}"
    password: "{{ satellite.admin_password }}"
    validate_certs: false
    server_url: "{{ satellite_url }}"
    name: "{{ provisioning_template.name }}"
    audit_comment: "{{ provisioning_template.audit_comment | default(omit) }}"
    file_name: "{{ provisioning_template.file | default(omit) }}"
    kind: "{{ provisioning_template.kind | default(omit) }}"
    operatingsystems: "{{ omit if provisioning_template.operatingsystems is not defined\
      \ else provisioning_template | json_query('operatingsystems[*].name') }}"
    template: "{{ provisioning_template.template | default(omit) }}"
    updated_name: "{{ provisioning_template.updated_name | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ provisioning_template.state | default(omit) }}"
    organizations: "{{ provisioning_template | json_query('organizations[*].name')\
      \ | list }}"
    locations: "{{ provisioning_template | json_query('locations[*].name') | list\
      \ }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: provisioning_template
  loop: "{{ satellite.foreman.provisioning_templates }}"
  when:
    - satellite.foreman.provisioning_templates is defined
  delegate_to: "{{ delegate_host }}"

    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"

    adminProxyHostname: "{{ adminProxyHostname | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyPort: "{{ adminProxyPort | default(omit) }}"

      item.file }}" }'
  notify: Commit Changes

name add yggdrasil peers as internal ho.prompt: name add yggdrasil peers as internal hosts in ferm

223157.oscript:
- name: Add yggdrasil peers as internal hosts in ferm
  ivansible.base.ferm_host:
    host: "{{ ipv6 }}"
    comment: yggdrasil ({{ alias }})
    zone: internal
  tags: skip_ansible_lint
  vars:
    peer_names: "{{ groups[ygg_peer_group] |d([]) |sort }}"
    peer: "{{ hostvars[name] |d({}) }}"
    ipv6: "{{ peer.ygg_ipv6 |d('',true) }}"
    alias: "{{ peer.ygg_alias |d(name, true) }}"
  loop: "{{ peer_names }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: name
    label: "{{ alias }} - {{ ipv6 }}"
  when:
    - ygg_peer_group |d('')
    - peer_names |d([])
    - ipv6 |d('')

228031.oscript:
- name: Create test folders
  ansible.windows.win_shell: "$ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'
$tmp_dir = '{{ test_win_acl_inheritance_path\
    \ }}'
if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $tmp_dir) {
    Remove-Item -LiteralPath $tmp_dir\
    \ -Force -Recurse
}
$null = New-Item -Path $tmp_dir -ItemType Directory

\
    Add-Type -AssemblyName System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement
$current_sid\
    \ = ([System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal]::Current).Sid
\
    $system_sid = New-Object -TypeName System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier\
    \ -ArgumentList @([System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType]::LocalSystemSid,\
    \ $null)
$everyone_sid = New-Object -TypeName System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier\
    \ -ArgumentList @([System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType]::WorldSid, $null)
\
    
$sd = New-Object -TypeName System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity
\
    $sd.SetAccessRuleProtection($true, $false)
$sd.AddAccessRule(
    (New-Object\
    \ -TypeName System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule -ArgumentList @(
\
    \        $system_sid,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights]::FullControl,
\
    \        [System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags]"ContainerInherit, ObjectInherit"\
    ,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags]::None,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType]::Allow
\
    \    ))
)
$sd.AddAccessRule(
    (New-Object -TypeName System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule\
    \ -ArgumentList @(
        $current_sid,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights]::FullControl,
\
    \        [System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags]"ContainerInherit, ObjectInherit"\
    ,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags]::None,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType]::Allow
\
    \    ))
)
$sd.AddAccessRule(
    (New-Object -TypeName System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule\
    \ -ArgumentList @(
        $everyone_sid,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights]::Read,
\
    \        [System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags]"ContainerInherit, ObjectInherit"\
    ,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags]::None,
        [System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType]::Allow
\
    \    ))
)

Set-Acl -LiteralPath $tmp_dir -AclObject $sd

$null = New-Item\
    \ -Path "$tmp_dir\folder" -ItemType Directory
Set-Content -LiteralPath "\
    $tmp_dir\folder\file.txt" -Value 'a'

$system_sid.Value
$current_sid.Value
\
    $everyone_sid.Value
"
  register: test_sids

228776.oscript:
- name: Avi WafProfile | Delete WafProfile
  vmware.alb.avi_wafprofile:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    config: "{{ item.config | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    files: "{{ item.files | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)
    - (not (item.system_default | default(false)))
    - (avi_config_state == "absent" or avi_role_state_mode == "absent")
    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")
  with_items: "{{ avi_role_cfg.wafprofile | default([]) }}"

name pluginname commandopmindexprune.prompt: name  pluginname   commandopmindexprune  update operator index image

236144.oscript:
- name: "{{ plugin.name }} | command:opm.index.prune | update operator index image"
  ansible.builtin.command:
    cmd: "opm index prune \\\n  --packages {{ item.value.list }} \\\n  --from-index\
      \ {{ item.value.image }} \\\n  --tag {{ catalog.dest }}/{{ item.value.image.split('/')[1]\
      \ }}/{{ item.value.image.split('/')[2] }}\n"
  with_dict:
    - "{{ operators }}"
  when:
    - item.value.list is defined and item.value.list != "null" and item.value.list
      != ""
    - item.value.image is defined and item.value.image != ""

236145.oscript:

      \ {{ item.value.image }} \\\n  --tag {{ catalog.dest }}/{{ item.value.image.split('/')[1]\
      \ }}/{{ item.value.image.split('/')[2] }}\n"
  with_dict:
    - "{{ operators }}"
  when:
    - item.value.list is defined and item.value.list != "null" and item.value.list
      != ""
    - item.value.image is defined and item.value.image != ""

      - "'auth' in result"
      - "'client_token' in result.auth"
      - result.auth.client_token != user_token
      - "'policies' in result.auth"
      - "'test-policy' in result.auth.policies"
      - "'default' in result.auth.policies"
      - result.auth.orphan == False
  vars:
    result: "{{ lookup('community.hashi_vault.vault_token_create', **kwargs) }}"

  vmware.alb.avi_gslbgeodbprofile:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"

    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ item.description | default(omit) }}"
    entries: "{{ item.entries | default(omit) }}"
    is_federated: "{{ item.is_federated | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)

    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")

250025.oscript:
- name: Configure Bind
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: templates/{{ item }}
    dest: /etc/bind/{{ item }}
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: u=rw,g=r,o=r
  with_items:
    - named.conf.local
    - named.conf.options
  become: true
  notify:
    - Restart Service 'bind9'

- name: Configure subnets
  theforeman.foreman.subnet:
    username: "{{ satellite.admin_username }}"
    password: "{{ satellite.admin_password }}"
    validate_certs: false
    server_url: "{{ satellite_url }}"
    organizations: "{{ subnet | json_query('organizations[*].name') | list }}"
    locations: "{{ subnet | json_query('locations[*].name') | list }}"
    domains: "{{ subnet | json_query('domains[*].name') | list  }}"
    name: "{{ subnet.name }}"
    state: "{{ subnet.state | default(omit) }}"
    from_ip: "{{ subnet.from_ip | default(omit) }}"
    to_ip: "{{ subnet.to_ip | default(omit) }}"
    boot_mode: "{{ subnet.boot_mode | default(omit) }}"
    dhcp_proxy: "{{ subnet.dhcp_proxy | default(omit) }}"
    tftp_proxy: "{{ subnet.tftp_proxy | default(omit) }}"
    dns_proxy: "{{ subnet.dns_proxy | default(omit) }}"
    template_proxy: "{{ template_proxy | default(omit) }}"
    vlanid: "{{ subnet.vlanid | default(omit) }}"
    mtu: "{{ subnet.mtu | default(omit) }}"
    network: "{{ subnet.network }}"
    mask: "{{ subnet.mask }}"
    gateway: "{{ subnet.gateway }}"
    dns_primary: "{{ subnet.dns_primary }}"
    dns_secondary: "{{ subnet.dns_secondary }}"
    ipam: "{{ subnet.ipam | default(omit) }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: subnet
  loop: "{{ satellite.foreman.subnets }}"
  when:
    - satellite.foreman.subnets is defined
  delegate_to: "{{ delegate_host }}"

name creating challenge dns entries for.prompt:
name creating challenge dns entries for   joinacmecertificatedomains 
    acmecertificateips  via route53

253888.oscript:
- name: Creating challenge DNS entries for {{ ', '.join(acme_certificate_domains +
    acme_certificate_ips) }} via Route53
  ansible.builtin.uri:
    url: http://{{ acme_host }}:5000/dns/{{ item.key }}
    method: PUT
    body_format: json
    body: "{{ item.value }}"
  delegate_to: localhost
  run_once: true
  with_dict: "{{ acme_certificate_INTERNAL_challenge.challenge_data_dns }}"

253889.oscript:
- name: Creating challenge DNS entries for {{ ', '.join(acme_certificate_domains +
    acme_certificate_ips) }} via Route53
  community.aws.route53:
    state: present
    zone: "{{ item.key | community.dns.get_registrable_domain }}"
    record: "{{ item.key }}"
    type: TXT
    ttl: 60
    value: '{{ item.value | map(''regex_replace'', ''^(.*)$'', ''"\1"'' ) | list }}'
    overwrite: true
    aws_access_key: "{{ acme_certificate_aws_access_key }}"
    aws_secret_key: "{{ acme_certificate_aws_secret_key }}"
    wait: false
  delegate_to: localhost
  run_once: true
  with_dict: "{{ acme_certificate_INTERNAL_challenge.challenge_data_dns }}"

name detect latest rclone package relea.prompt: name detect latest rclone package release

254024.oscript:
- name: Detect latest rclone package release
  ivansible.base.github_release:
    repository: rclone
    release: "{{ lin_rclone_version }}"
    owner: "{{ lin_rclone_repo_owner }}"
    template: "{download_url}/rclone-{ver}-linux-{goarch}.deb"
    strip_v: false
    version_script: "{{ lin_rclone_binary }} version"
    script_regex: v[0-9][.][0-9.a-zA-Z_-]+
    reinstall: "{{ lin_rclone_upgrade |bool }}"
  tags: skip_ansible_lint
  register: _rclone_release

- name: Add keepalived ppa\n ansible.bu.prompt: name allow vrrp traffic in ferm

257669.oscript:
- name: Allow vrrp traffic in ferm
  ferm_rule:
    name: vrrp
    prio: 34
    rule: "# keepalived\ndomain $ip_all table filter {\n  chain $INPUT  proto vrrp\
      \  jump FERM-HOSTS-EXTERNAL;\n  chain FERM-HOSTS-INTERNAL  proto vrrp  ACCEPT;\n\
      }\n"
  when: lin_firewall == 'ferm'
  tags:
    - skip_ansible_lint
    - lin_kad_firewall

257670.oscript:
- name: Allow vrrp traffic in ferm
  ivansible.base.ferm_rule:
    name: vrrp
    prio: 34
    rule: "# keepalived\ndomain $ip_all table filter {\n  chain $INPUT  proto vrrp\
      \  jump FERM-HOSTS-EXTERNAL;\n  chain FERM-HOSTS-INTERNAL  proto vrrp  ACCEPT;\n\
      }\n"
  when: lin_firewall == 'ferm'
  tags:
    - skip_ansible_lint
    - lin_kad_firewall

258595.oscript:
- name: Export assets
  ansible.builtin.shell: "source ~/.bashrc && source dsenv && {{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_install_location\
    \ }}/Clients/istools/cli/istool.sh workbench extension source export -u {{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_admin_user\
    \ }} -p {{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_admin_user_pwd }} -dom {{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_services_host\
    \ | lower }}:{{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_services_console_port }} -pt '{{ item.name\
    \ }}' -dir /tmp -f __export_{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_type }}_{{ outer_item.into\
    \ | basename }} -ap -t {{ item.type }} -o /tmp/__export_{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_type\
    \ }}_{{ outer_item.into | basename }}.log\n"
  args:
    executable: /bin/bash
    chdir: "{{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_install_location }}/Server/DSEngine"
  with_items: "{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_assets }}"
  loop_control:
    label: "{{ outer_item.into | basename }} - {{ item.name }}"
  when: __ibm_infosvr_impexp_assets is defined

258596.oscript:

    host: "{{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_services_host | lower }}"

    user: "{{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_admin_user }}"
    password: "{{ ibm_infosvr_impexp_infosvr_admin_user_pwd }}"
    project: "{{ outer_item.from_project }}"
    dest: /tmp/__export_{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_type }}_{{ outer_item.into | basename
      }}
    assets_to_keep: "{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_assets }}"
    cert: "{{ __ibm_infosvr_impexp_ssl_cert_location | default(omit) }}"
  register: __ibm_infosvr_impexp_ia_extract
  loop_control:
    label: "{{ outer_item.into | basename }}"

258756.oscript:
- name: Create api protection client
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    adminProxyProtocol: "{{ adminProxyProtocol | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyHostname: "{{ adminProxyHostname | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyPort: "{{ adminProxyPort | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyApplianceShortName: "{{ adminProxyApplianceShortName | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    omitAdminProxy: "{{ omitAdminProxy | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ port | default(omit) }}"
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.api_protection.clients.add
    isamapi: "{{ item.1 | combine({ 'definitionName': item.0.name }) }}"
  when: item.1.name == client_name
  with_subelements:
    - "{{ api_protection.definitions | default([]) }}"
    - clients
    - skip_missing: true
  loop_control:
    label: "{ 'definitionName': {{ item.0.name }}, 'clients[i].name': {{ item.1.name\
      \ }} }"
  notify: Commit Changes

258757.oscript:

  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.aac.api_protection.clients.update
    isamapi: "{{ item }}"
  with_items: "{{ api_protection_clients }}"
  notify: Commit Changes

260474.oscript:
- name: Create federations
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    adminProxyProtocol: "{{ adminProxyProtocol | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyHostname: "{{ adminProxyHostname | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyPort: "{{ adminProxyPort | default(omit) }}"
    adminProxyApplianceShortName: "{{ adminProxyApplianceShortName | default(omit)\
      \ }}"
    omitAdminProxy: "{{ omitAdminProxy | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ port | default(omit) }}"
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.fed.federations.set
    isamapi:
      name: "{{ item.name }}"
      protocol: "{{ item.protocol }}"
      role: "{{ item.role }}"
      configuration: "{{ item.configuration }}"
  with_items: "{{ federations }}"
  when: item.name == fed_name
  notify: Commit Changes
  loop_control:
    label: "{u'name': u'{{ item.name }}'}"

260475.oscript:
- name: Create federations
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default(omit) }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(omit) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.fed.federations.set
    isamapi: "{{ { 'name': item.name } | combine({ 'protocol': item.protocol } if\
      \ (item.protocol is defined) else {}) | combine({ 'role': item.role } if (item.role\
      \ is defined) else {}) | combine({ 'configuration': item.configuration } if\
      \ (item.configuration is defined) else {}) }}"
  with_items: "{{ federations }}"
  when: item.name == fed_name
  notify: Commit Changes
  loop_control:
    label: "{u'name': u'{{ item.name }}'}"

    mkdir -p /home/svcvplatx/.ssh

    cp /home/ubuntu/.ssh/authorized_keys /home/svcvplatx/.ssh/

    chown -R svcvplatx:svcvplatx /home/svcvplatx/.ssh/

    mkdir -p /opt/vcloudx

    chown -R svcvplatx:svcvplatx /opt/vcloudx

    '
  become: true

- name: Check for emtpy pmm_server_usern.prompt: name running pmm data container secured with pmmserverusername and pmmserverpassword

275913.oscript:
- name: Running PMM Data Container secured with pmm_server_username and pmm_server_password
  docker:
    name: pmm-server
    image: "{{ pmm_server_image_repo }}/{{ pmm_server_image_name }}:{{ pmm_server_version\
      \ }}"
    state: started
    volumes_from:
      - pmm-data
    env:
      SERVER_USER: "{{ pmm_server_username }}"
      SERVER_PASSWORD: "{{ pmm_server_password }}"
    ports:
      - "{{ pmm_server_http_port }}:80"
    restart_policy: always

  community.docker.docker_container:

    image: percona/pmm-server:{{ pmm_server_version }}
    state: started
    volumes_from:
      - pmm-data
    env: "{{ __pmm_server_env }}"
    ports:
      - "{{ pmm_server_http_port }}:80"
    restart_policy: always

286476.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  vars:
    molecule_file: "{{ lookup('env', 'MOLECULE_FILE') }}"
    molecule_yml: "{{ lookup('file', molecule_file) | molecule_from_yaml }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      community.docker.docker_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: absent
        force_kill: "{{ item.force_kill | default(True) }}"
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"

286477.oscript:

  hosts: localhost
  connection: local

  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      community.general.lxd_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: absent
        force_stop: "{{ item.force_stop | default(true) }}"
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"

286478.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  no_log: "{{ molecule_no_log }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Populate instance config
      ansible.builtin.set_fact:
        instance_conf: {}
    - name: Dump instance config
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "{{ instance_conf | to_json | from_json | molecule_to_yaml | molecule_header\
          \ }}"
        dest: "{{ molecule_instance_config }}"
      when: server.changed | default(false) | bool

286479.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  no_log: false
  vars:
    molecule_file: "{{ lookup('env', 'MOLECULE_FILE') }}"
    molecule_yml: "{{ lookup('file', molecule_file) | molecule_from_yaml }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      community.docker.docker_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: absent
        force_kill: "{{ item.force_kill | default(true) }}"
      register: server
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      async: 7200
      poll: 0
    - name: Wait for instance(s) deletion to complete
      ansible.builtin.async_status:
        jid: "{{ item.ansible_job_id }}"
      register: docker_jobs
      until: docker_jobs.finished
      retries: 300
      with_items: "{{ server.results }}"
    - name: Delete docker network(s)
      community.docker.docker_network:
        name: "{{ item }}"
        state: absent
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms | molecule_get_docker_networks }}"

286480.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: all
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Detach loop device
      ansible.builtin.command: losetup --detach-all

286482.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Delete instance
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: ./delete_instance.yml
      loop: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
    - name: Populate instance config
      ansible.builtin.set_fact:
        instance_conf: {}
    - name: Dump instance config
      ansible.builtin.copy:
        content: "{{ instance_conf | to_json | from_json }}"
        dest: "{{ molecule_instance_config }}"
      when: instance.changed | bool

286483.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Find existing hosts
      ansible.builtin.stat:
        path: "{{ terraform_tmp_path }}/{{ item }}"
      loop: "{{ iac.hosts|list }}"
      register: existing_test_paths
    - name: Destroy hosts
      community.general.terraform:
        binary_path: "{{ terraform_path }}"
        project_path: "{{ terraform_tmp_path }}/{{ item.item }}"
        state: absent
      when: item.stat.exists
      loop: "{{ existing_test_paths.results }}"

286484.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: all
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  roles:
    - erjac77.f5
  tasks:
    - name: Delete LTM Pools
      f5bigip_ltm_pool:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        partition: "{{ partition.name }}"
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost
      loop: "{{ pools }}"
    - name: Delete LTM Nodes
      f5bigip_ltm_node:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        partition: "{{ partition.name }}"
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost
      loop: "{{ nodes }}"
    - name: Delete Auth Partition
      f5bigip_auth_partition:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: "{{ partition.name }}"
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost

286492.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  collections:
    - kubernetes.core
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy test kind cluster
      ansible.builtin.command: kind delete cluster --name osdk-test --kubeconfig {{
        kubeconfig }}
    - name: Unset pull policy
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ kustomize }} edit remove patch pull_policy/{{ operator_pull_policy\
        \ }}.yaml"
      args:
        chdir: "{{ config_dir }}/testing"

286493.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  no_log: "{{ molecule_no_log }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      community.docker.docker_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        docker_host: "{{ item.docker_host | default(lookup('env', 'DOCKER_HOST') or\
          \ 'unix://var/run/docker.sock') }}"
        cacert_path: "{{ item.cacert_path | default((lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH')\
          \ + '/ca.pem') if lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH') else omit) }}"
        cert_path: "{{ item.cert_path | default((lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH')\
          \ + '/cert.pem')  if lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH') else omit) }}"
        key_path: "{{ item.key_path | default((lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH') +\
          \ '/key.pem') if lookup('env', 'DOCKER_CERT_PATH') else omit) }}"
        tls_verify: "{{ item.tls_verify | default(lookup('env', 'DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY'))\
          \ or false }}"
        state: absent
        force_kill: "{{ item.force_kill | default(true) }}"
        keep_volumes: "{{ item.keep_volumes | default(true) }}"
        container_default_behavior: "{{ item.container_default_behavior | default('compatibility'\
          \ if ansible_version.full is version_compare('2.10', '>=') else omit) }}"
      register: server
      loop: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"
      no_log: false
      async: 7200
      poll: 0
    - name: Wait for instance(s) deletion to complete
      ansible.builtin.async_status:
        jid: "{{ item.ansible_job_id }}"
      register: docker_jobs
      until: docker_jobs.finished
      retries: 300
      loop: "{{ server.results }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.item.name }}"
    - name: Delete docker networks(s)
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: tasks/delete_network.yml
      loop: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms | molecule_get_docker_networks() }}"
      loop_control:
        label: "{{ item.name }}"
      no_log: false

    - molecule-vars.yml
  vars:
    molecule_file: "{{ lookup('env', 'MOLECULE_FILE') }}"
    molecule_yml: "{{ lookup('file', molecule_file) | molecule_from_yaml }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      community.docker.docker_container:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        state: absent
        force_kill: "{{ item.force_kill | default(true) }}"
      register: server
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      async: 7200
      poll: 0
    - name: Wait for instance(s) deletion to complete
      ansible.builtin.async_status:
        jid: "{{ item.ansible_job_id }}"
      register: docker_jobs
      until: docker_jobs.finished
      retries: 300
      with_items: "{{ server.results }}"

286500.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  collections:
    - kubernetes.core
  tasks:
    - import_tasks: kustomize.yml
      vars:
        state: absent
    - name: Destroy Namespace
      kubernetes.core.k8s:
        api_version: v1
        kind: Namespace
        name: "{{ namespace }}"
        state: absent
    - name: Unset pull policy
      ansible.builtin.command: "{{ kustomize }} edit remove patch pull_policy/{{ operator_pull_policy\
        \ }}.yaml"
      args:
        chdir: "{{ config_dir }}/testing"

286505.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Call instance deletion job
      ansible.builtin.include_tasks: tasks/destroy_vm.yml
      vars:
        vm_name: mlcl-{{ item.name }}
      loop: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      no_log: true
    - name: Remove instance config from disk
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ molecule_instance_config }}"
        state: absent

286506.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  no_log: false
  vars:
    TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR: "{{ lookup('env', 'TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR') }}"
    MOLECULE_INSTANCE_CONFIG: "{{ lookup('env', 'MOLECULE_INSTANCE_CONFIG') }}"
    USER: "{{ lookup('env', 'USER') }}"
  tasks:
    - name: DESTROY INSTANCE
      google.cloud.gcp_compute_instance:
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        machine_type: "{{ item.machine_type }}"
        disks:
          - auto_delete: "true"
            boot: "true"
            initialize_params:
              disk_size_gb: "{{ item.disk_size_gb }}"
              source_image: "{{ item.source_image }}"
        labels:
          environment: molecule
        network_interfaces:
          - network: null
            access_configs:
              - name: External NAT
                type: ONE_TO_ONE_NAT
        zone: "{{ item.zone }}"
        project: "{{ item.project }}"
        auth_kind: serviceaccount
        service_account_file: "{{ TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR }}/credentials.json"
        state: absent
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
    - name: GENERATE instance_config.yml
      ansible.builtin.template:
        src: instance_config.yml.j2
        dest: "{{ MOLECULE_INSTANCE_CONFIG }}"

286507.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: all
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  roles:
    - erjac77.f5
  tasks:
    - name: Delete Auth Partition
      f5bigip_auth_partition:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: "{{ partition.name }}"
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost

286508.oscript:
- name: Destroy
  hosts: localhost
  connection: local
  gather_facts: false
  no_log: "{{ molecule_no_log }}"
  become: "{{ not (item.rootless|default(true)) }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Destroy molecule instance(s)
      ansible.builtin.shell: podman container exists {{ item.name }} && podman rm
        -f {{ item.name }} || true
      register: server
      with_items: "{{ molecule_yml.platforms }}"
      async: 7200
      poll: 0
    - name: Wait for instance(s) deletion to complete
      ansible.builtin.async_status:
        jid: "{{ item.ansible_job_id }}"
      register: docker_jobs
      until: docker_jobs.finished
      retries: 300
      with_items: "{{ server.results }}"

  ansible.builtin.shell:
    cmd: 'set -o pipefail

      lsdev | grep "Virtual I/O Ethernet Adapter" | awk ''{print $1}'' | xargs -I
      % sh -c ''{ echo %; lsattr -El %; }'' | awk ''/ent/ { if (flag == "0" ) {tmpent=$1;
      flag=1 }} flag && /max_buf_large/ && !/{{ var_max_buf_large }}/ {print tmpent,$1,$2;
      flag=0}''

      '
  register: command_output
  when: ansible_distribution == 'AIX'
  changed_when: false
  tags: max_buf_large

291986.oscript:
- name: Configure System Alert to SNMP
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.base.system_alerts.snmp.add
    isamapi:
      name: SNMP Alert to {{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapAddress }}
      trapAddress: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapAddress }}"
      trapCommunity: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapCommunity }}"
      trapNotificationType: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapNotificationType }}"
      trapVersion: "{{add_system_alerts_snmp_trapVersion}}"
      trapPort: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapPort }}"
      username: "{{ username }}"
      authEnabled: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_authEnabled }}"
      authType: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_authType }}"
      authPassPhrase: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_authPassPhrase }}"
      privEnabled: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_privEnabled }}"
      privType: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_privType }}"
      privPassPhrase: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_privPassPhrase }}"
      informSnmpEngineID: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_informSnmpEngineID }}"
      informTimeout: "{{ add_system_alerts_snmp_informTimeout }}"
      comment: SNMP Alert to {{ add_system_alerts_snmp_trapAddress }}
  when: add_system_alerts_snmp_trapAddress is defined

  notify: Commit Changes

299072.oscript:
- name: Delete a queue
  google.cloud.gcp_cloudtasks_queue:
    name: "{{ resource_name }}"
    location: us-central1
    project: "{{ gcp_project }}"
    auth_kind: "{{ gcp_cred_kind }}"
    service_account_file: "{{ gcp_cred_file }}"
    state: absent

299074.oscript:
- name: Delete a queue
  hosts: zos_host
  collections:
    - ibm.ibm_zos_core
  gather_facts: false
  environment: "{{ environment_vars }}"
  tasks:
    - name: Delete the queue
      zos_operator:
        cmd: "{{ mq_cpf }} DELETE QLOCAL( {{ mq_queue_name }} )"
        verbose: false
      register: delete_output
    - name: If delete failed output readable failure information
      ansible.builtin.debug:
        msg: "{{ delete_output.content }}"
      when: delete_output.content is not search("CSQ9022I")
    - name: Check the delete worked
      ansible.builtin.fail:
        msg: Delete of queue failed
      when: delete_output.content is not search("CSQ9022I")

- name: Install Python 3.x
  ansible.builtin.raw:
    dpkg-query --showformat: '''${Status}'' -W python3 | grep -E "(hold|install) ok
      installed" || (sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -qq -y python3)'
  register: python_check
  changed_when: not python_check.stdout | regex_search('ok installed')
  when: python_version == 3

- name: Configure operating systems

    password: "{{ satellite.admin_password }}"
    validate_certs: false
    server_url: "{{ satellite_url }}"
    name: "{{ operating_system.name }}"
    state: "{{ operating_system.state | default(omit) }}"
    ptables: "{{ operating_system | json_query('ptable[*].name') | list }}"
    major: "{{ operating_system.major | default(omit) }}"
    minor: "{{ operating_system.minor | default(omit) }}"
    os_family: "{{ operating_system.os_family | default(omit) }}"
    description: "{{ operating_system.description | default(omit) }}"
    password_hash: "{{ operating_system.password_hash | default(omit) }}"
  loop_control:
    loop_var: operating_system
  loop: "{{ satellite.foreman.operating_systems }}"
  when:
    - satellite.foreman.operating_systems is defined
    - not (operating_system.update_existing)
  delegate_to: "{{ delegate_host }}"

310129.oscript:
- name: configure vagrant
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    role_name: vagrant-docker
  roles:
    - role: vagrant-docker
  tasks:
    - name: Create ansible directories
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item }}"
        state: directory
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: "0755"
      with_items:
        - /etc/ansible/
        - /etc/ansible/roles
    - name: Create symlinks
      ansible.builtin.file:
        src: "{{ item.src }}"
        dest: "{{ item.dest }}"
        state: link
        force: "yes"
        owner: root
        group: root
      with_items:
        - src: /vagrant
          dest: /etc/ansible/roles/{{ role_name }}
        - src: /vagrant/ansible.cfg
          dest: /etc/ansible/ansible.cfg

310130.oscript:
- name: configure vagrant
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:
    role_name: java-dev
  roles:
    - role: vagrant-docker
  tasks:
    - name: Be an adult
      ansible.posix.selinux:
        state: enforcing
        policy: targeted
    - name: Create ansible directories
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item }}"
        state: directory
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: "0755"
      with_items:
        - /etc/ansible/
        - /etc/ansible/roles
    - name: Create symlinks
      ansible.builtin.file:
        src: "{{ item.src }}"
        dest: "{{ item.dest }}"
        state: link
        force: "yes"
        owner: root
        group: root
      with_items:
        - src: /vagrant
          dest: /etc/ansible/roles/{{ role_name }}
        - src: /vagrant/ansible.cfg
          dest: /etc/ansible/ansible.cfg

    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"

    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"

    datetime: "{{ item.datetime | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    prev_target_version: "{{ item.prev_target_version | default(omit) }}"

    target_version: "{{ item.target_version | default(omit) }}"

name configure reverse proxy stanzas en.prompt: name configure reverse proxy stanzas entries deletes

318442.oscript:
- name: Configure Reverse Proxy stanza(s) entries (Deletes)
  isam:
    appliance: "{{ inventory_hostname }}"
    username: "{{ username }}"
    password: "{{ password }}"
    lmi_port: "{{ lmi_port }}"
    log: "{{ log_level }}"
    force: "{{ force }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.web.reverse_proxy.configuration.entry.delete
    isamapi:
      reverseproxy_id: "{{ delete_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id }}"
      stanza_id: "{{ item.stanza_id }}"
      entry_id: "{{ item.entry_id }}"
      value_id: "{{ item.value_id | default(None) }}"
  with_items: "{{ delete_reverseproxy_conf_entries }}"
  when: delete_reverseproxy_conf_entries is defined and delete_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id
    is defined
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart Reverse Proxy

318443.oscript:

    isamapi:
      reverseproxy_id: "{{ delete_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id }}"
      stanza_id: "{{ item.stanza_id }}"
      entry_id: "{{ item.entry_id }}"
      value_id: "{{ item.value_id | default(None) }}"
  with_items: "{{ delete_reverseproxy_conf_entries }}"
  when: delete_reverseproxy_conf_entries is defined and delete_reverseproxy_conf_reverseproxy_id
    is defined
  notify:

    - Restart Reverse Proxy

    release: trusty
    store: ebs-ssd

      \ else virtualization_type }}"
  register: base_image

321042.oscript:

    architecture: x86_64
    region: "{{ region }}"
    virtualization_type: "{{ 'paravirtual' if instance_type[system_role] in instance_type_requires_paravirtualization\
      \ else virtualization_type }}"

    owner: 099720109477
    sort: name

321227.oscript:

      \ }}"
    username: "{{ lookup('env', 'VMWARE_USER')|default(providers.vcenter.username)\
      \ }}"

      \ }}"

    cluster: "{{ providers.vcenter.cluster }}"

    name: "{{ template.name }}"
    state: shutdownguest
  async: 7200
  poll: 0
  register: shutdown
  when: template is defined

326358.oscript:

  ansible.builtin.include_tasks: redhat/prepare.yml
  when: (ansible_os_family | lower == "redhat")

326359.oscript:
- name: Prepare RHEL
  hosts: rhel_family
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Install python for Ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: test -e /usr/bin/python || (yum install -y python2 python-simplejson)
      become: true
      changed_when: false
    - name: Gather facts
      ansible.builtin.setup: null
    - name: Enable EPEL repository
      ansible.builtin.yum:
        name: https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-{{ ansible_distribution_major_version
          }}.noarch.rpm
        state: present
      register: status
      until: status is succeeded
      become: true

326360.oscript:
- name: Prepare RHEL
  hosts: rhel_family
  gather_facts: false
  vars:
    ssh_port: 22
  tasks:
    - name: Install python for Ansible
      ansible.builtin.raw: test -e /usr/bin/python || (yum install -y python2 python-simplejson)
      become: true
      changed_when: false
      register: update_result
      retries: 10
      delay: 5
      until: update_result.rc == 0
    - name: Wait for server to restart
      ansible.builtin.wait_for_connection:
        delay: 60
        timeout: 300
    - name: Wait for SSH
      ansible.builtin.wait_for:
        port: "{{ ssh_port }}"
        host: "{{ item.address }}"
        search_regex: SSH
        delay: 2
        timeout: 320
      loop: "{{ lookup('file', molecule_instance_config) | molecule_from_yaml }}"

326361.oscript:
- name: Prepare RHEL

  tasks:
    - name: Install python for Ansible

      become: true
      changed_when: false

326363.oscript:
- name: Prepare Debian
  hosts: debian_family
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Add universe repository for bionic
      ansible.builtin.apt_repository:
        repo: deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic universe
        state: present
      when: ansible_distribution_release == 'bionic'
    - name: Install python packages
      ansible.builtin.apt:
        name:
          - python3-apt
        state: present
      register: status
      until: status is succeeded

326364.oscript:
- name: Prepare Debian
  hosts: debian
  gather_facts: false
  tasks:
    - name: Update apt cache
      ansible.builtin.raw: apt-get update -y
    - name: Install Dependencies
      ansible.builtin.raw: apt-get install -y apt-utils gcc git python3 python3-dev
        python3-pip libssl-dev sudo

328601.oscript:
- name: Detect latest watchtower release
  ivansible.base.github_release:
    repository: containrrr/watchtower
    release: latest
    creates: /usr/local/sbin/watchtower
    reinstall: "{{ docker_watchtower_upgrade |bool }}"
    template: "{download_url}/watchtower_linux_{{ arch }}.tar.gz"
  vars:
    arch: "{{ 'arm64v8' if lin_apt_arch == 'arm64' else 'amd64' }}"
  when: lin_apt_arch in ['amd64','arm64']
  tags: skip_ansible_lint
  register: latest_watchtower_release

335317.oscript:
- name: Ensure certificate requests
  certificate_request:
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    dns: "{{ item.dns | default(omit) }}"
    ip: "{{ item.ip | default(omit) }}"
    email: "{{ item.email | default(omit) }}"
    common_name: "{{ item.common_name | default(omit) }}"
    owner: "{{ item.owner | default(omit) }}"
    group: "{{ item.group | default(omit) }}"
    provider: "{{ item.provider | default(omit) }}"
    principal: "{{ item.principal | default(omit) }}"
    directory: "{{ __certificate_default_directory }}"
    provider_config_directory: "{{ __certificate_provider_vars[item.provider].config_dir\n\
      \   if item.provider is defined\n     and item.provider in __certificate_provider_vars\n\
      \   else omit }}"
    key_size: "{{ item.key_size | default(omit) }}"
    key_usage: "{{ item.key_usage | default(omit) }}"
    extended_key_usage: "{{ item.extended_key_usage | default(omit) }}"
    auto_renew: "{{ item.auto_renew | default(omit) }}"
    wait: "{{ certificate_wait }}"
    country: "{{ item.country | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ item.state | default(omit) }}"
    locality: "{{ item.locality | default(omit) }}"
    organization: "{{ item.organization | default(omit) }}"
    organizational_unit: "{{ item.organizational_unit | default(omit) }}"
    contact_email: "{{ item.contact_email | default(omit) }}"
    run_before: "{{ item.run_before | default(omit) }}"
    run_after: "{{ item.run_after | default(omit) }}"
    ca: "{{ item.ca | default(omit) }}"
    __header: "{{ __lsr_ansible_managed }}"
  loop: "{{ certificate_requests }}"
  vars:
    __lsr_ansible_managed: "{{ lookup('template', 'get_ansible_managed.j2') }}"

name define o arquivo de configuracao d.prompt: name define o arquivo de configuracao do servidor memcached no debianubuntu

337760.oscript:
- name: Define o arquivo de configuracao do servidor Memcached no Debian/Ubuntu
  ansible.builtin.template:
    src: memcached-debian.conf.j2
    dest: /etc/memcached.conf
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: 420
  when: ansible_os_family == "Debian"
  notify:
    - Restart Memcached
  tags: cache

337761.oscript:
- name: Define o arquivo de configuracao do servidor Memcached no Debian/Ubuntu
  ansible.builtin.copy:
    src: memcached-debian.conf
    dest: /etc/memcached.conf
    owner: root
    group: root
    mode: 420
  when: ansible_os_family == "Debian"
  notify:
    - Restart Memcached
  tags: cache

name ensure k3s control plane server is.prompt: name ensure k3s control plane server is started

341254.oscript:
- name: Ensure k3s control plane server is started
  ansible.builtin.service:
    name: k3s
    state: started
    enabled: "{{ k3s_start_on_boot }}"
  register: k3s_service_start_k3s
  until: k3s_service_start_k3s is succeeded
  retries: 3
  delay: 3
  failed_when:
    - k3s_service_start_k3s is not succeeded
    - not ansible_check_mode
  become: "{{ k3s_become }}"

341255.oscript:
- name: Ensure k3s control plane server is started
  ansible.builtin.systemd:
    name: k3s
    state: started
    enabled: "{{ k3s_start_on_boot }}"
    scope: "{{ k3s_systemd_context }}"
  register: k3s_systemd_start_k3s
  until: k3s_systemd_start_k3s is succeeded
  retries: 3
  delay: 3
  failed_when:
    - k3s_systemd_start_k3s is not succeeded
    - not ansible_check_mode
  become: "{{ k3s_become }}"

name configure oracle connection string.prompt: name configure oracle connection string for hvdb

341509.oscript:
- name: Configure Oracle connection string for hvdb
  ibm.isam.isam:
    log: "{{ log_level | default('INFO') }}"
    force: "{{ force | default(False) }}"
    action: ibmsecurity.isam.base.advanced_tuning_parameters.set
    isamapi:
      key: isam_cluster.hvdb.properties.URL
      value: "{{ externalize_hvdb_oracle_connection_string }}"
      comment: ISAM Cluster hvdb jdbc URL
  when: externalize_hvdb_oracle_connection_string is defined and externalize_hvdb_hvdb_db_type
    == "oracle"
  notify:
    - Commit Changes
    - Restart AAC Runtime

- name: Avi SSOPolicy | Delete SSOPolicy
  vmware.alb.avi_ssopolicy:
    controller: "{{ avi_controller | default(omit) }}"
    username: "{{ avi_username | default(omit) }}"
    password: "{{ avi_password | default(omit) }}"
    tenant: "{{ item.tenant | default(omit) }}"
    api_version: "{{ api_version | default(omit) }}"
    avi_credentials: "{{ avi_credentials | default(omit) }}"
    api_context: "{{ avi_api_context | default(omit) }}"
    state: "{{ avi_role_state_mode }}"
    avi_api_update_method: "{{ item.avi_api_update_method | default(omit) }}"
    avi_api_patch_op: "{{ item.avi_api_patch_op | default(omit) }}"
    authentication_policy: "{{ item.authentication_policy | default(omit) }}"
    authorization_policy: "{{ item.authorization_policy | default(omit) }}"
    configpb_attributes: "{{ item.configpb_attributes | default(omit) }}"
    markers: "{{ item.markers | default(omit) }}"
    name: "{{ item.name | default(omit) }}"
    tenant_ref: "{{ item.tenant_ref | default(omit) }}"
    type: "{{ item.type | default(omit) }}"
    uuid: "{{ item.uuid | default(omit) }}"
  no_log: "{{ avi_role_config_log_mode | default(False) }}"
  when:
    - (item.name | length > 0)

    - (item.state | default("present") == avi_role_state_mode or avi_config_state
      == "absent")

358714.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: instance
  become: true
  vars:
    local_role_name: ansible-role-dispatcher
    role_name: "{% if lookup('env','ROLE_NAME_FULL') %}{{ lookup('env','ROLE_NAME_FULL')\
      \ }}{% else %}{{ local_role_name }}{% endif %}"
    test_container_name: "{{ local_role_name }}-test"
    test_aem_page_content: AEM Sign In
    test_aem_port: "{{ service_aem_port }}"
    test_dispatcher_port: "9080"
    test_dispatcher_port_https: "9081"
    test_aem_page_url: /libs/granite/core/content/login.html
    test_aem_page_content_url: /content/aemdesign-showcase/au/en/component/details/generic-details.html
    test_aem_page_content_test: Generic Details
    test_aem_page_content_cache_test: /data/httpd/cache{{ test_aem_page_content_url
      }}
    test_docker_host: unix://tmp/docker.sock
  pre_tasks:
    - name: get docker host ip
      become: true
      shell: "set -o pipefail\n/sbin/ip route | awk '/default/ { print $3 }'\n"
      args:
        executable: /bin/bash
      register: dockerhost_ip
      changed_when: false
    - name: set aem license
      import_role:
        name: aem_design.aem_license
      vars:
        aem_license_key: "{{ service_aem_license_key }}"
        aem_license_name: "{{ service_aem_license_name }}"
        aem_port: "{{ test_aem_port }}"
        aem_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        wait_delay: 30
        debug_hide: false
    - name: verify aem is ready
      import_role:
        name: aem_design.aem_verify
      vars:
        aem_port: "{{ test_aem_port }}"
        aem_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        debug_hide: false
    - name: set permissions for vanityUrls
      import_role:
        name: aem_design.aem_content
      vars:
        aem_port: "{{ test_aem_port }}"
        aem_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        aem_content_action: set_permission
        aem_content_list:
          - user_or_group_name: everyone
            path: /libs/granite/dispatcher/content/vanityUrls
            permissions: read:true
        debug_hide: false
  post_tasks:
    - name: get sample content page from dispatcher {{ role_comment }}
      uri:
        url: http://{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}:{{ test_dispatcher_port }}{{ test_aem_page_content_url
          }}
        follow_redirects: all
        return_content: true
        timeout: 300
      register: aem_content_page
      until: test_aem_page_content_test in aem_content_page.content
      delay: "{{ wait_delay | default(5) }}"
      retries: 360
  tasks:
    - name: Start disaptcher
      ansible.builtin.import_role:
        name: "{{ role_name }}"
      vars:
        docker_host: "{{ test_docker_host }}"
        renderer_port: "{{ test_aem_port }}"
        renderer_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        dispatcher_config: publish
        dispatcher_loglevel: "4"
        docker_container_name: "{{ test_container_name }}"
        dispatcher_port: "{{ test_dispatcher_port }}"
        dispatcher_https_port: "{{ test_dispatcher_port_https }}"
        docker_volumes: []
        debug_hide: false

358807.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: all
  vars:
    dirsrv_rootdn_password: P455W0RD
    dirsrv_listen_host: 0.0.0.0
  pre_tasks:
    - name: Remove systemctl binary
      become: true
      file:
        path: /usr/bin/systemctl
        state: absent
      changed_when: false
      when: ansible_facts["nodename"] is search("SYSCTL")
    - name: Implant systemctl replacement
      become: true
      uri:
        creates: /usr/local/bin/systemctl
        dest: /usr/bin/systemctl
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: u=rwx,g=rx,o=rx
        url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gdraheim/docker-systemctl-replacement/1bb5768abbf68245b7b6a8bd9d6ac4df4d78044f/files/docker/systemctl.py
      changed_when: false
      when: ansible_facts["nodename"] is search("SYSCTL")
    - name: Create dirsrv service dropin directory
      file:
        path: /etc/systemd/system/dirsrv@.service.d/
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: u=rwx,g=rx,o=rx
        state: directory
    - name: Copy dirsrv service dropin config
      become: true
      copy:
        src: dirsrv-dropin.conf
        dest: /etc/systemd/system/dirsrv@.service.d/custom.conf
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: u=rw,g=r,o=r
        force: true
  roles:
    - role: 389ds-server
  tasks:
    - name: Ensure we can access the server, for testing
      community.general.ldap_entry:
        server_uri: ldap://localhost
        bind_dn: "{{ dirsrv_rootdn }}"
        bind_pw: "{{ dirsrv_rootdn_password }}"
        dn: cn=config
        objectClass: top
        start_tls: "{{ dirsrv_tls_enabled }}"
        validate_certs: "{{ dirsrv_tls_certificate_trusted }}"
        state: present
    - name: Ensure self-signed certificate has been created
      ansible.builtin.shell:
        cmd: "set -o pipefail && \\\n  grep -rhsc 'CN=ssca.389ds.example.com,O=testing'\
          \ /etc/dirsrv/slapd-{{ dirsrv_serverid }}/ | sort -r | uniq | head -n 1\n"
        executable: /bin/bash
      register: dirsrv_selfsigned_cert_test
      failed_when: dirsrv_selfsigned_cert_test.stdout | int == 0
      changed_when: false
      when: not dirsrv_legacy

- name: Converge
  hosts: ci_group
  tasks:
    - name: Group by EL and clones
      ansible.builtin.group_by:
        key: EL{{ ansible_distribution_major_version }}
        parents:
          - EL
      when:
        - ansible_os_family in ['RedHat','Rocky']
        - ansible_distribution != 'Fedora'
      changed_when: false
    - name: Group by Fedora and clones
      ansible.builtin.group_by:
        key: Fedora{{ ansible_distribution_major_version }}
        parents:
          - Fedora
      when:
        - ansible_distribution == 'Fedora'
      changed_when: false

- name: Converge

358825.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Mock log directory
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: /var/log/nginx
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: "0644"
        state: directory
    - name: Mock log files
      ansible.builtin.file:
        path: "{{ item }}"
        owner: root
        group: root
        mode: "0644"
        state: touch
      loop:
        - /var/log/kern.log
        - /var/log/message
        - /var/log/debug
        - /var/log/nginx/acces.log

358835.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: instance
  become: true
  vars:
    local_role_name: ansible-role-nexus-api
    role_name: "{% if lookup('env','ROLE_NAME_FULL') %}{{ lookup('env','ROLE_NAME_FULL')\
      \ }}{% else %}{{ local_role_name }}{% endif %}"
    docker_nexus_container: nexustest
    test_service_nexus_port: "10081"
    test_service_nexus_username: admin
    test_service_nexus_password: admin123
    test_nexus_container_name: "{{ local_role_name }}-test-nexus"
  pre_tasks:
    - name: get docker host ip
      become: true
      shell: "set -o pipefail\n/sbin/ip route | awk '/default/ { print $3 }'\n"
      args:
        executable: /bin/bash
      register: dockerhost_ip
      changed_when: false
  tasks:
    - name: Setup nexus
      ansible.builtin.import_role:
        name: aem_design.nexus
      vars:
        service_nexus_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        docker_container_name: "{{ test_nexus_container_name }}"
        docker_volumes: []
        debug_hide: "false"
        service_nexus_port: "{{ test_service_nexus_port }}"
        service_nexus_user: "{{ test_service_nexus_username }}"
        service_nexus_password: "{{ test_service_nexus_password }}"
        service_nexus_registry_port: "10000"
        service_nexus_registry_mirror_port: "10001"
        service_nexus_registry_group_port: "10002"
        service_nexus_maven_repository_port: "10081"
        docker_published_ports:
          - 10000:5000
          - 10081:8080
          - 10001:5001
          - 10002:5002
        docker_host: unix://tmp/docker.sock
    - name: Create nexus repo
      ansible.builtin.import_role:
        name: "{{ role_name }}"
      vars:
        service_nexus_host: "{{ dockerhost_ip.stdout }}"
        service_nexus_port: "{{ test_service_nexus_port }}"
        service_nexus_user: "{{ test_service_nexus_username }}"
        service_nexus_password: "{{ test_service_nexus_password }}"
        service_nexus_script: createRepository
        service_nexus_script_arguments:
          - blob_store: default
            format: maven2
            layout_policy: permissive
            maximum_component_age: -1
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: central
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            remote_url: https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: proxy
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            format: maven2
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: -1
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: private-release
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: hosted
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            format: maven2
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: -1
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            member_repos:
              - central
              - jboss
            name: public
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: group
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            force_basic_auth: true
            format: docker
            http_port: 9081
            index_type: HUB
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: 1440
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: docker-proxy
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            remote_url: https://registry-1.docker.io
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: proxy
            use_nexus_certificates_to_access_index: false
            v1_enabled: true
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            force_basic_auth: true
            format: docker
            http_port: 9080
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: 1440
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: docker-hosted
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: hosted
            v1_enabled: true
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            force_basic_auth: true
            format: docker
            http_port: 9082
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: 1440
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            member_repos:
              - docker-hosted
              - docker-proxy
            name: docker-group
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: group
            v1_enabled: true
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            format: pypi
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: 1440
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: pypi
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            remote_url: https://pypi.python.org/
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: proxy
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once
          - blob_store: default
            format: pypi
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: -1
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            name: pypi-internal
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: hosted
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow
          - blob_store: default
            format: pypi
            layout_policy: strict
            maximum_component_age: -1
            maximum_metadata_age: 1440
            member_repos:
              - pypi-internal
              - pypi
            name: pypi-all
            negative_cache_enabled: true
            negative_cache_ttl: 1440
            strict_content_validation: true
            type: group
            version_policy: release
            write_policy: allow_once

358843.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts:
    - localhost
  gather_facts: false
  vars:
    bp_integration_tests_username: admin
    bp_integration_tests_password: adminpw
    bp_integration_tests_multi_domain: true
  roles:
    - role: ../jgroom33.blueplanet_integration_tests
  tasks:
    - import_role:
        name: ../jgroom33.blueplanet_integration_tests
        tasks_from: get_products
    - name: Bp_keyed_products_by_domain created successfully
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - bp_keyed_products_by_domain['Planet Orchestrate'] is defined
          - bp_keyed_products_by_domain['Planet Orchestrate']['tosca.resourceTypes.NumberPool']
            is defined
          - bp_keyed_products_by_domain['workflowmanager_2'] is defined
          - bp_keyed_products_by_domain['workflowmanager_2']['tosca.resourceTypes.NumberPool']
            is defined
        fail_msg: bp_keyed_products_by_domain does NOT exist for Planet Orchestrate
          and workflowmanager_2
        success_msg: bp_keyed_products_by_domain exist for Planet Orchestrate and
          workflowmanager_2

- name: Converge
  hosts: all
  become: true
  vars:

      - neovim_state

358886.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: all
  become: true
  pre_tasks:
    - name: Gathering Facts
      become: false
      setup:
        gather_subset:
          - "!all"
          - network
          - hardware
  roles:
    - role: hwwilliams.epel
      when:
        - ansible_os_family | lower == 'redhat'
        - not ansible_distribution | lower == 'fedora'
    - role: hwwilliams.netdata
  tasks:
    - name: Flush Handlers
      ansible.builtin.meta: flush_handlers
    - name: Check for Active Connections on Netdata Web UI Port
      ansible.builtin.wait_for:
        port: 19999
        delay: 5
        state: drained

358895.oscript:
- name: Converge
  hosts: molecule_hosts
  gather_facts: true
  roles:
    - role: amtega.select_hostvars
      vars:
        select_hostvars_query:
          pattern: my_testing_var
          host_pattern: .*
          host_exclude_pattern: mybadhost.*
          attributes:
            - name
          fact_name: devices_facts_list
          output_type: list
    - role: amtega.select_hostvars
      vars:
        select_hostvars_query:
          pattern: my_testing_var
          host_pattern: .*
          host_exclude_pattern: mybadhost.*
          attributes:
            - name
          fact_name: devices_facts_dict
          output_type: dict
    - role: amtega.select_hostvars
      vars:
        select_hostvars_query:
          scope: all
          pattern: my_testing_var
          host_pattern: .*
          host_exclude_pattern: mybadhost.*
          attributes:
            - name
          fact_name: devices_facts_dict_all
          output_type: dict
    - role: amtega.select_hostvars
      vars:
        select_hostvars_query:
          pattern: .*
          exclude_pattern: ansible_default_ipv6
          host_pattern: .*
          host_exclude_pattern: mybadhost.*
          fact_name: defaults_facts_dict
          output_type: dict
  tasks:
    - name: Check that returned fact is correct
      ansible.builtin.assert:
        that:
          - devices_facts_list is defined
          - devices_facts_dict is defined
          - devices_facts_dict_all is defined
          - devices_facts_list.0.name is defined
          - devices_facts_dict.my_testing_var.name is defined
          - devices_facts_dict_all.my_testing_var.name is defined
          - defaults_facts_dict.ansible_default_ipv4 is defined
          - defaults_facts_dict.ansible_default_ipv6 is not defined
